This amazing world is full of dangers, you will have very little time to make decisions, you need a lot of ingenuity and good reaction to achieve at least some results.Jump, dodge, fly around obstacles in its path, if you bump into an obstacle, the story is over.The game offers 5 modes :Flight - fly around the poles. Caution! Some columns can move.Running - live in the rhythm of parkour, run, jumping over barriers. You can do a double jump.Jumping - you need to get as high as possible, you will have to pursue the monster, which will annihilate the floor beneath you. If you are not fast enough, it will fall.Spider - fly on the web through the tunnel, you will find many obstacles in the way and they are not very simple. (This is the most difficult in the game mode)Bonus mode.Game Features:- Procedurally generated blocks world and buildings.- Cool graphics: enjoy the best pixel cube graphics with high fps.- Free game: play the game for free!- Choose your super heroe. - You can unlock four mine characters.- Incredibly easy operation.Go to adventure!
descriptionHTML:
Superhero you and your craft - survival. This amazing world is full of dangers, you will have very little time to make decisions, you need a lot of ingenuity and good reaction to achieve at least some results.
Jump, dodge, fly around obstacles in its path, if you bump into an obstacle, the story is over.


The game offers 5 modes :
Flight - fly around the poles. Caution! Some columns can move.
Running - live in the rhythm of parkour, run, jumping over barriers. You can do a double jump.
Jumping - you need to get as high as possible, you will have to pursue the monster, which will annihilate the floor beneath you. If you are not fast enough, it will fall.
Spider - fly on the web through the tunnel, you will find many obstacles in the way and they are not very simple. (This is the most difficult in the game mode)
Bonus mode.

Game Features:
- Procedurally generated blocks world and buildings.
- Cool graphics: enjoy the best pixel cube graphics with high fps.
- Free game: play the game for free!
- Choose your super heroe.
- You can unlock four mine characters.
- Incredibly easy operation.


Go to adventure!
summary: The main goal - to move forward no matter what. Survive at all costs.
title: Quad Squad

description: Jaramba Förskola är en version av Sveriges största app för små barn – Jaramba – särskilt framtagen för Sveriges förskoleverksamheter. Genom appen får pedagoger och förskolebarn tillgång till massor av Jarambas material, nu sorterat och framtaget med läroplanen för förskolan i åtanke!Jaramba Förskolas navigering är speciellt framtagen för pedagoger utan att göra det svårt för barnen att ta del av materialet på egen hand. Under ämnen som språk, matematik, naturkunskap och värdegrund hittar ni övningar för stavning, räkning, färg och form och så klart hur man är en bra kompis. I Jaramba Förskola har vi samarbetat med en mängd leverantörer som Natur & Kultur, Piratförlaget och Hatten Förlag i ett försök att samla material som uppmuntrar barn till att lära sig, förstå och diskutera. Ta hjälp av massor av karaktärer som Babblarna, Svea och Pino för att engagera era förskolebarn!Hur fungerar Jaramba Förskola?• Jaramba Förskola ger obegränsad tillgång till innehåll som motsvarar hundratals fristående appar• Nya spel, filmer, upplästa böcker och annat roligt läggs till varje månad i en aldrig sinande ström av nytt material• Det speciellt framtagna gränssnittet riktar sig till dig som pedagog för att du enkelt ska kunna förbereda, eller spontant starta, en lärorik stund med barnen• Använd ett abonnemang för en avdelning på upp till 20 barn• Styr vad barnen fokuserar på med Jaramba Förskolas fokuslås• Jaramba Förskola streamar sitt innehåll direkt på en Android-enhet, så appen upptar aldrig onödigt utrymme.Då Jaramba förskola är avsedd för bruk i förskoleverksamhet kommer vi till en början att administrera användarkonton genom intresseanmälan på https://jaramba.se/forskolaKontakta Jaramba online för att komma igång med konto för din förskola idag!Integritetspolicy: https://www.jaramba.se/policy/Användarvillkor: https://www.jaramba.se/villkor/
descriptionHTML:
Jaramba Förskola är en version av Sveriges största app för små barn – Jaramba – särskilt framtagen för Sveriges förskoleverksamheter. Genom appen får pedagoger och förskolebarn tillgång till massor av Jarambas material, nu sorterat och framtaget med läroplanen för förskolan i åtanke!

Jaramba Förskolas navigering är speciellt framtagen för pedagoger utan att göra det svårt för barnen att ta del av materialet på egen hand. Under ämnen som språk, matematik, naturkunskap och värdegrund hittar ni övningar för stavning, räkning, färg och form och så klart hur man är en bra kompis.
I Jaramba Förskola har vi samarbetat med en mängd leverantörer som Natur & Kultur, Piratförlaget och Hatten Förlag i ett försök att samla material som uppmuntrar barn till att lära sig, förstå och diskutera. Ta hjälp av massor av karaktärer som Babblarna, Svea och Pino för att engagera era förskolebarn!

Hur fungerar Jaramba Förskola?

• Jaramba Förskola ger obegränsad tillgång till innehåll som motsvarar hundratals fristående appar
• Nya spel, filmer, upplästa böcker och annat roligt läggs till varje månad i en aldrig sinande ström av nytt material
• Det speciellt framtagna gränssnittet riktar sig till dig som pedagog för att du enkelt ska kunna förbereda, eller spontant starta, en lärorik stund med barnen
• Använd ett abonnemang för en avdelning på upp till 20 barn
• Styr vad barnen fokuserar på med Jaramba Förskolas fokuslås
• Jaramba Förskola streamar sitt innehåll direkt på en Android-enhet, så appen upptar aldrig onödigt utrymme.

Då Jaramba förskola är avsedd för bruk i förskoleverksamhet kommer vi till en början att administrera användarkonton genom intresseanmälan på https://jaramba.se/forskola
Kontakta Jaramba online för att komma igång med konto för din förskola idag!

Integritetspolicy: https://www.jaramba.se/policy/
Användarvillkor: https://www.jaramba.se/villkor/
recentChanges: - Stöd för länkar direkt till mediabrickor och spellistor
summary: An app specially developed for Swedish preschools. All the exercises in the same place!
title: Jaramba Förskola – Digitalt hjälpmedel i förskolan

description: Test out your cooking skills by making your own cupcake recipe. You'll get to cook like a real baker by mixing up all of the ingredients, baking your cupcakes, and decorating them with cute designs. Flower garden cupcakes have a fun and unique design that is sure to impress everyone. When you're finished baking and decorating your cupcakes, enjoy them yourself or share them with your friends!Features:Mix all of the ingredients that go into making these special cupcakes, including flour, milk, butter, and eggs.Follow the steps carefully to ensure that everything gets done in the right order in and that you don’t forget to add any of the important ingredients.You’ll make the batter and the frosting from scratch to ensure that your flower garden cupcakes taste like freshly baked, homemade cupcakes.Decorate the cupcakes as fast as you can so that there are some ready for everyone before the party starts.
descriptionHTML:
Test out your cooking skills by making your own cupcake recipe. You'll get to cook like a real baker by mixing up all of the ingredients, baking your cupcakes, and decorating them with cute designs. Flower garden cupcakes have a fun and unique design that is sure to impress everyone. When you're finished baking and decorating your cupcakes, enjoy them yourself or share them with your friends!

Features:

Mix all of the ingredients that go into making these special cupcakes, including flour, milk, butter, and eggs.

Follow the steps carefully to ensure that everything gets done in the right order in and that you don’t forget to add any of the important ingredients.

You’ll make the batter and the frosting from scratch to ensure that your flower garden cupcakes taste like freshly baked, homemade cupcakes.

Decorate the cupcakes as fast as you can so that there are some ready for everyone before the party starts.
summary: Bake and decorate your own delicious flower garden cupcakes.
title: Cook Flower Garden Cupcakes

description: If you love makeup, beauty secrets and Ice Princess, then this game was made for you!  Play to enter a magical make-up salon and apply beauty products on the beautiful princess of winter!In this game for girls you’ll have complete freedom to design an endless collection of different looks and styles, with unforgettable makeups and fairy-like hairdos. Ice Princess will challenge your imagination with tons of crystal-like eye-shadows, blush colors and amazing lipsticks, plus, absolutely fabulous and wintry face-paints to give the makeup a final touch of awesomeness.And when it comes to the hairstyles chapter, be sure you’ll have tons to choose from! Ice-Princess loves changing the color and looks each day, so all you need to do is choose!Browse through tens of colorful hairstyles, braids and ponytails, then choose your favorite hairlock color to glam the fancy hairdo up.For a final touch, choose from the wonderful tiaras collection the one that will make your queen of all the lands of ice shine the most! Match it up with a divine top, and there you have if: the story is complete and your princess is ready to charm the world once more with diamonds sparkles and winter-glam all around. • Play to discover all these wintertime features: • Skin-tones and blushes • Eye-lenses and eyebrows • Fabulous mascaras • Tons of glamorous eyeshadows• Sparkly and matte lipstick colors• Wintry face-paints• Icy tops• Necklaces and earrings• Beautiful hairstyles  • Wonderful tiaras So if you’re looking for a casual game that combines the magic of the most wintry winter, with beauty, icy jewels, and fabulous makeup, here it is!
descriptionHTML:
If you love makeup, beauty secrets and Ice Princess, then this game was made for you!
Play to enter a magical make-up salon and apply beauty products on the beautiful princess of winter!

In this game for girls you’ll have complete freedom to design an endless collection of different looks and styles, with unforgettable makeups and fairy-like hairdos. Ice Princess will challenge your imagination with tons of crystal-like eye-shadows, blush colors and amazing lipsticks, plus, absolutely fabulous and wintry face-paints to give the makeup a final touch of awesomeness.

And when it comes to the hairstyles chapter, be sure you’ll have tons to choose from! Ice-Princess loves changing the color and looks each day, so all you need to do is choose!
Browse through tens of colorful hairstyles, braids and ponytails, then choose your favorite hairlock color to glam the fancy hairdo up.

For a final touch, choose from the wonderful tiaras collection the one that will make your queen of all the lands of ice shine the most! Match it up with a divine top, and there you have if: the story is complete and your princess is ready to charm the world once more with diamonds sparkles and winter-glam all around.

• Play to discover all these wintertime features:
• Skin-tones and blushes
• Eye-lenses and eyebrows
• Fabulous mascaras
• Tons of glamorous eyeshadows
• Sparkly and matte lipstick colors
• Wintry face-paints
• Icy tops
• Necklaces and earrings
• Beautiful hairstyles
• Wonderful tiaras

So if you’re looking for a casual game that combines the magic of the most wintry winter, with beauty, icy jewels, and fabulous makeup, here it is!
summary: If you love makeup and Ice Princess, then this game was made for you!
title: Ice Princess Makeup

comments: Super fun needs minor improvements Actually very fun but could use a speedometer calibration, the cars go from 215 mph and shoot way down to 170 in the corners of the first track, the speed seems too fast for what the cars are actually doing.. It seems a little stretched but that's all. and sound improvements for the cars ... Other than that it's legit

Graphics are decent. Controls are good. However,  you can earn 10x more $ for a 5 lap race than a 400 lap race. Many times you will be in 1st or 2nd and as the last lap winds down you lose several positions even though nobody passes you.  Oh and the "coming soon" section, don't expect to ever see anything else show up there. Overall, it's a fun game to pass the time,  but these bugs have been reported for at least 2 years and never been fixed.

I love  this   game Still loving the game. Just wanted to put this out there. It would be cool if you could make it to were you could put different designs on the cars like pant the middle the front and rear different colors kinda like the Nascar games. Just wanted to put that out there. But I there way the game still rocks. An for the ppl that thinks it sucks they must not like racing because I've looked at all the round track games and this one is the best of all. Ur biggest fan.

Needs lots of improvement......... 1. Improve graphics quality like extreme car racing . It will improve the game.  2. Increase the number of opponents in the race.  3. Seriously I don't believe that you added 400 laps race , I think it will be better to race rookies cup which give you 1000 dollar games in just 5 lap.     And you are providing 3000 game dollar for 400 laps . I think you should decrease the 400 laps to 100 or 60 laps it will be a better choice. 4. You have added pit lane in the game so provide a pit stop in the game also .

Great Game but can they add something! Add in cautions, working pit Stalls with tire ware and fuel usage, and tire air pressure adjustment settings so we do get as loose as we do. If you do I will make a YouTube Series about the game and keep this good review!

If possible need there needs to be another look at the position of your car during the race. Ice noticed mulitple times that once i get to first place, i win in first but when i go ro collect thw reward cash it always says seventh or eighth place.. its really irking.  Please fix. Otherwise i do enjoy the game
description: Drivers start your engines! Professional oval track racing that explodes with racing action!Experience the adrenaline as you power over 600 horses around the track. Choose your stock car and race on 5 different speedways including the 1 Mile, 2.5mi Quad-Oval, a 1.5mi Tri-Oval and the Paperclip!RACE MODES :Multiplayer - Race head to head against other playersRegulation  - Race and set the difficulty for higher prizesLadder - Race against progressively faster opponents for increasing prizes.Endurance - Race the full 400 lap distance.Hot Lap - Set your fastest single lap on Game CenterPractice - Practice racing lines and setup car for race trimCARS:Includes cars from the golden-era right up to the modern-era. Drive Super Trucks or 1970s classics. Sprint cars and dirt track racing coming soon!EXPERIENCE THE SPEEDFeel your machine on the absolute limit of adhesion. Earn in-game cash to buy, upgrade, repair and adjust your Stock Car. Qualify to unlock new tracks for increasing prize money. ONLINE MULTIPLAYER RACINGBeat your friends and join the privileged few to make it onto the leaderboards.MULTIPLE TRACKS4 unique tracks to unlock.REAL CRASH PHYSICSPersistent car-damage with sparks, smoke and flames for realistic racing.CUSTOMISE YOUR STOCKCARDesign your Stock Car with team colours and racing numbers in the Paintshop.UPGRADE YOUR STOCKCAREngine, tires and chassis increasing your car's overall performance.SETUP YOUR STOCK CARAllows you to adjust your car for race trim.REAL SIMULATIONVisually stunning 3D graphics and realistic physics.RUBBER-BANDING ASSISTHelps gets you back into the race quicker.EARN IN-GAME CASHBased on finishing position and calculated each lap round, the higher you place the more you earn.Drivers start your engines!
descriptionHTML:
Drivers start your engines! Professional oval track racing that explodes with racing action!

Experience the adrenaline as you power over 600 horses around the track. Choose your stock car and race on 5 different speedways including the 1 Mile, 2.5mi Quad-Oval, a 1.5mi Tri-Oval and the Paperclip!

RACE MODES :
Multiplayer - Race head to head against other players
Regulation - Race and set the difficulty for higher prizes
Ladder - Race against progressively faster opponents for increasing prizes.
Endurance - Race the full 400 lap distance.
Hot Lap - Set your fastest single lap on Game Center
Practice - Practice racing lines and setup car for race trim

CARS:
Includes cars from the golden-era right up to the modern-era. Drive Super Trucks or 1970s classics. Sprint cars and dirt track racing coming soon!

EXPERIENCE THE SPEED
Feel your machine on the absolute limit of adhesion. Earn in-game cash to buy, upgrade, repair and adjust your Stock Car. Qualify to unlock new tracks for increasing prize money.

ONLINE MULTIPLAYER RACING
Beat your friends and join the privileged few to make it onto the leaderboards.

MULTIPLE TRACKS
4 unique tracks to unlock.

REAL CRASH PHYSICS
Persistent car-damage with sparks, smoke and flames for realistic racing.

CUSTOMISE YOUR STOCKCAR
Design your Stock Car with team colours and racing numbers in the Paintshop.

UPGRADE YOUR STOCKCAR
Engine, tires and chassis increasing your car's overall performance.

SETUP YOUR STOCK CAR
Allows you to adjust your car for race trim.

REAL SIMULATION
Visually stunning 3D graphics and realistic physics.

RUBBER-BANDING ASSIST
Helps gets you back into the race quicker.

EARN IN-GAME CASH
Based on finishing position and calculated each lap round, the higher you place the more you earn.

Drivers start your engines!

comments: The graphics are nice, but the controls are very hard. Especially in a boat. I finally built a boat, but I couldn't go anywhere because the boat only went in one direction wherever I tried to steer. The pets are very helpful, but there are way too many ads. I placed a campfire down but later it disappeared. I can't move an object I placed, and I accidentally placed a campfire in front of my doorway and I couldn't destroy it nor move it. Changing the direction of furniture would be handy too because I couldn't fit the bed in my tiny house because I couldn't switch the direction it was facing. I also couldn't make more than one thing at a time. If I were to cook food in my oven, I had to wait because I couldn't make something in my workshop while something was cooking.
Finally i got my wood house and a bad bt in NYT I  go to.bad  take some option when i m nt active I want take rest on my bad. And my all energy get back than it's a cool game well nyc game

I really like this game, it's fun and addictive! One thing happened that I'm not to impressed with though. I got a pet elephant, but it disappeared and now has made everything harder once more. Could you please give me my pet elephant back.

I see a lot of other reviews dissing the adds for a *FREE* game (umm... Use cash for pixels and buy an ad free game then... Making games isn't easy and/or cheap and sponsorship {ads} is how it is funded... stop feeling entitled) My complaint is the lack of directives after initial survival is achieved and well I'm not a guy and would rather have a choice in gender. Fun but much underdeveloped. Love to see this built upon

Call me shallow but I've dissed the game because there is no english flag. I know you might say 'well i can't put every flag in' but english must be one of the top 5 countries, especially for language.  For that i haven't given a good reveiw.

I see a lot of reviews saying this game is boring. Well, kind of right and kind of wrong. It is tedious getting started but once you figure out what you want to do, this game is like most surviver games. You get resources, build stuff and kill animals. So if you are looking for an action packed kill em all experience, this game is not for you.

descriptionHTML:
You don’t remember how you got to this island, but now you’re stranded in the wild. Surviving here will be no simple task. First you’ll need to find food, craft some primitive tools, and build a shelter. Think you have what it takes? Your survival adventure is about to begin…

Game features:
*Explore the wilderness!
*Build your house from the ground up!
*Utilize an extensive crafting system with tons of recipes!
*Meet the island fauna!
*Island survival sandbox simulator.

Survivalist tips:
★Begin with chopping wood in the forest. Wood is used for craft.
★Craft armor and weapons for fighting wild animals.
★Don’t starve, survivor: collect all available resources to keep yourself fed.
★Craft everything you might need.
★Keep track of your health, or you won’t survive…

If you like other survival games, play Survival Island: Evolve – it’ll be just what you’re looking for. Begin your survival adventure now!

*IMPORTANT. Online multiplayer is still in development and will be available soon. Follow our news feed to be the first to know when you can play with friends!

description: Its mechanics is very simple you only have to press with your finger the badly placed pieces of road and look for the correct position until forming and completing the car puzzle. All parts must be properly connected. Demonstrate your mental ability and become part of the great players. Intelligence video games are an excellent way to improve brain performance. Each exercise is a riddle that urges us to look for the right result. They are puzzles with a unique answer, looking for solutions to each problem.This game has difficult puzzles at higher levels. It has a perfect learning level for those players looking for fun without having to eat their head. If you like math puzzles this is your game. Solve each puzzle with exact solutions.Exercise memory for free with this logic and strategy video game. Playing will make you think and test you. Solve the visual puzzles 100% free and get inside the club of the wit of the most intelligent people in the world as the genius Einstein. Complete this puzzle car puzzle with progressive difficulty. Look for the right path as in the pipe games and build the race track.It will be the ABC of all your mental agility pastimes and test your intelligence. Complete the levels and dashboard forming the race tracks, join the roads. Practice with these games to exercise your mind: reasoning, logic, memory and mental / cognitive skills to train throughout your life to get your brain in shape. With the practice of mental exercises will help improve your ability to solve mathematical problems in your daily life.Logic puzzles | Cars puzzle contains:- Translated into 22 languages: English, Spanish, French, German, Italian, Portuguese, Brazilian, Turkish, Russian, Malay, Japanese, Chinese, Danish, Norwegian, Polish , Swedish, Indonesian, Arabic, Korean, Thai, Indian and Persian.- Different sections of roads.- Simple logic.- Simple and intuitive controls.- Difficulty of puzzles from easier to more difficult.- Does not contain purchases within the application.- Hours of fun.- No annoying ads.- Car puzzle game that you must build racing car circuits.- More than 100 logic puzzles with exclusive response.- Video game totally free.- You do not need the Internet.- It takes up little space.- You can train the mind.Remember that logic is the branch of philosophy that studies the geometries and general principles that rule over all knowledge and human thought, considered purely in itself, without reference to objects. In addition to being a method or reasoning in which ideas or the sequence of events that are manifested or are developed in a coherent way and without there being contradictions between them.* * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * *Do not forget to vote, rate and / or comment on the Google Play Store in order to improve (suggestions, graphic errors, translation errors, improvements, suggestions ...)
descriptionHTML:
Its mechanics is very simple you only have to press with your finger the badly placed pieces of road and look for the correct position until forming and completing the car puzzle. All parts must be properly connected. Demonstrate your mental ability and become part of the great players. Intelligence video games are an excellent way to improve brain performance. Each exercise is a riddle that urges us to look for the right result. They are puzzles with a unique answer, looking for solutions to each problem.

This game has difficult puzzles at higher levels. It has a perfect learning level for those players looking for fun without having to eat their head. If you like math puzzles this is your game. Solve each puzzle with exact solutions.

Exercise memory for free with this logic and strategy video game. Playing will make you think and test you. Solve the visual puzzles 100% free and get inside the club of the wit of the most intelligent people in the world as the genius Einstein. Complete this puzzle car puzzle with progressive difficulty. Look for the right path as in the pipe games and build the race track.

It will be the ABC of all your mental agility pastimes and test your intelligence. Complete the levels and dashboard forming the race tracks, join the roads. Practice with these games to exercise your mind: reasoning, logic, memory and mental / cognitive skills to train throughout your life to get your brain in shape. With the practice of mental exercises will help improve your ability to solve mathematical problems in your daily life.

Logic puzzles | Cars puzzle contains:
- Translated into 22 languages: English, Spanish, French, German, Italian, Portuguese, Brazilian, Turkish, Russian, Malay, Japanese, Chinese, Danish, Norwegian, Polish , Swedish, Indonesian, Arabic, Korean, Thai, Indian and Persian.
- Different sections of roads.
- Simple logic.
- Simple and intuitive controls.
- Difficulty of puzzles from easier to more difficult.
- Does not contain purchases within the application.
- Hours of fun.
- No annoying ads.
- Car puzzle game that you must build racing car circuits.
- More than 100 logic puzzles with exclusive response.
- Video game totally free.
- You do not need the Internet.
- It takes up little space.
- You can train the mind.

Remember that logic is the branch of philosophy that studies the geometries and general principles that rule over all knowledge and human thought, considered purely in itself, without reference to objects. In addition to being a method or reasoning in which ideas or the sequence of events that are manifested or are developed in a coherent way and without there being contradictions between them.

* * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * *

description: Become king of the mountain!  Arctic Cat® Extreme Snowmobile Racing allows players go on an epic snowmobile journey. Travel as far and fast as possible through endless scenic winter environments. Conquer hills, maneuver moguls, pound though powder, and clear mountain gaps. Upgrade real Arctic Cat sleds to catch big air and pull off sick tricks. Unleash your inner cat with customizable sled skins and characters.Features• Endless Rider that will challenge you with multiple environments• Simple controls will get you riding quickly• Ride real Arctic Cat sleds• Unique trick system to pull off big air and even bigger rewards• Dozens of characters and sled skins to collect and show off your style• Share your best rides and tricks with your friends via EveryPlay

Crafted and play-tested with kids and toddlers, TutoTOONS games cherish the childhood and help children learn the basic life skills through the games they love. These are just a few examples how TutoTOONS games let children explore the world around them and develop on their screen time.

description: You are a master archer and the long awaited hero that will compete and conquer the Survival Hungry Games event in triumph! Now it’s the time to fight for your survival against numerous waves of zombies, soldiers, demons and other strange creatures that invade your blocky world dimension. Use your unmatched archery skills and manipulate time wisely in order to emerge victorious. Let The Games begin!Vigilante, outcast, master archer, hero. Your path has never been the one of comfort and mundane pleasures, but the one of adventure, inner search and hard training. After many years of absence, you have returned to your hometown to compete in the Survival Hungry Games for a chance to earn the freedom of your people. You now have a plan to crush the totalitarian regime that has turned the human race into a cruel sport for the entertainment of the privileged. It’s time for you to fight back using your unmatched archery skills, your martial arts training and your untamed warrior soul.Let The Games begin! The Survival Hungry Games event takes place in various locations of your blocky world, where the brave challengers fight for their survival against numerous waves of zombies, soldiers, demons and other strange creatures that invade our dimension through portals. Progress through your missions, mow down enemies and blow away groups of foes as you battle unique opponents with their own set of challenges. Utilize your archery skills, plan out your tactics and use time manipulation wisely, in this ultimate battle against all odds in this action-packed survival game. It's do or die...

description: Manage your own smart car wash & gas station to provide car services including washing, paint job and designing. Play Smart Car Wash Service: Gas Station and drive luxury car to refill fuel at the highway service station. Get behind the wheel of muscle cars and drive towards the city service station in car wash games 2018. Put pedal to the metal, park smart car inside automatic car wash games for cleanup and do exciting car customization. For complete engine repair & highway service like oil change, maintenance park inside the auto repair shop. Drive smart car around metro city and park at the highway gas station games to refill the petrol in car washing games.  Luxury cars are arriving in the highway service station for cleanup and car customization, so you as car mechanic have a tough job to do. Get behind the wheel to drive and park super muscle cars at the gas station parking. The luxury cars are directly coming from dirt racing tracks and some of them were involved in police car chase. Entertain yourself and take the smart car in repair garage for inspection and complete engine service in car washing games. Check smart car engine, bumper, alloy wheels and rims to ensure it's clean. Exterior rollover smart car wash is automated system where you drive your luxury car inside the bay. Once your police car is in the correct position, a signal informs you to stop. At that point, the muscle car wash equipment moves over your smart car on a track, performing a specific function, such as applying soap and rinsing like other car customization games.After cleanup at the car wash games you will be able to design and customize highway service car the way customers desire. For designing you will be using various vinyl stickers to give incredible look to muscle cars just like in car mechanic simulator 18. Drive luxury car inside the paint shop to change the color and remove stains, rust and scratches. Operate your gas station and complete smart car parking & driving tasks in car customization games. The car wash station is fully automatic all you need to do is park the luxury car inside car wash and repair games. Simulate your world and tuneup police car engine inside the repair shop garage. The repair shop garage is located next to the paint shop at highway gas station games. This repair shop garage is equipped with all the latest car mechanic simulator tools. This is perfect blend of top rated games like police car parking and smart car wash games.Smart Car Wash Service: Gas Station Car Parking Game Features:Challenging time based luxury car washing, refuel and paint job levelsMultiple muscle car customization: suv, sedan, prado, corvette, limo Realistic highway service gas station environment to drive onUltra realistic police car physics with real v8 engine soundsSmooth vehicle controls for immersive gameplayDownload Smart Car Wash Service: Gas Station Car Parking games now for FREE & entertain yourself!

description: In this terrifying map for Minecraft you have a unique possibility not only to find yourself in the unusual and creepy world of the popular horror-game, but to play for one of its characters too. If you’re ready to test your nerves, download our new MCPE map for free and imagine yourself a hero of the famous horror-game!In this map for Minecraft you can choose a character, for whom you want to play, and you can a choice of four main heroes: Bendy, Boris, Joe and Henry. As soon as you make a decision, you will get a chest with different unusual things, which will be definitely very useful during the game. Each hero of this map for MCPE has its own plotline and, that’s why things in the chest are completely different, because every character will face special dangers and numerous obstacles. But, nevertheless, no matter whom will you choose, each of this four characters of this exciting map for Minecraft has to go through the maze, avoiding treacherous traps and creepy places, in order to save his/her life and find the way out of this dangerous place. Except this main aim, every character has their own special tasks, which you need to complete too. All action in this map for Minecraft is going on the dark wooden maze, consisting of numerous mazy corridors, cells and creepy places. If you’re not scared, and you’re ready to dive into terrifying world of Bendy and his friends, download our new map for Minecraft for free, and try to survive in this dangerous world of horror-game!You will need to install Minecraft Pocket Edition on your mobile device for this map.DISCLAIMER: This map for MCPE isn’t made or supported by Mojang. Minecraft and Minecraft Pocket Edition are official trademarks of Mojang AB. The developers of this MCPE map don’t cooperate with Mojang. This application fully adheres to the terms set up by Mojang AB. More info at https://account.mojang.com/terms.

As soon as you make a decision, you will get a chest with different unusual things, which will be definitely very useful during the game. Each hero of this map for MCPE has its own plotline and, that’s why things in the chest are completely different, because every character will face special dangers and numerous obstacles. But, nevertheless, no matter whom will you choose, each of this four characters of this exciting map for Minecraft has to go through the maze, avoiding treacherous traps and creepy places, in order to save his/her life and find the way out of this dangerous place. Except this main aim, every character has their own special tasks, which you need to complete too.
All action in this map for Minecraft is going on the dark wooden maze, consisting of numerous mazy corridors, cells and creepy places. If you’re not scared, and you’re ready to dive into terrifying world of Bendy and his friends, download our new map for Minecraft for free, and try to survive in this dangerous world of horror-game!

You will need to install Minecraft Pocket Edition on your mobile device for this map.
DISCLAIMER: This map for MCPE isn’t made or supported by Mojang. Minecraft and Minecraft Pocket Edition are official trademarks of Mojang AB. The developers of this MCPE map don’t cooperate with Mojang. This application fully adheres to the terms set up by Mojang AB. More info at https://account.mojang.com/terms.
summary: Become a character of the creepy horror-game with our MCPE map!
title: Bendy’s Roleplay. Map for MCPE

comments: This game is not good. All you do is drive to a circle so an animation takes over while the avatar rescues a cat from a tree. Or you pull in to a circle and tap the screen a couple times to close a valve. You move from circle to circle being stuck in one spot at each one. There is very limited movement during tasks. And then on top of it you do all kinds of non-firefighter tasks. Clearing logs from a street? Really? That's a public works job. Closing a water valve? That's utilities. Rescuing a cat? Come on. That's animal control. Firefighters don't actually rescue cats from trees. And the missions are short. Pretty sure I finished the game in 20 minutes.

I can not get this game to work. It says 'Your hardware does not support this application'. This has happened with a few other fireman games. I have a new Sony XZ Premium phone so I don't understand why it won't work. Can anyone tell me if I can resolve this problem?
Good game, slightly annoying at times to control movement of the characters, tend to become awkward when trying to stay in straight line. Other than that is a good game to pass the time!
Made for kids....and made for them to accidentally click the rediculous amount of adds
Very good game we get a good experience of firefighters
The hose is kinda weird on the truck... Like... the cab...
description: Want to serve humanity? Like rescue, action, driving and parking games? NY City Firefighter 2017 awaits!On a bright sunny day in New York City, you encounter a building in flames! You are a courageous firefighter, and your duty is to rescue your fellow New Yorkers. Are you up for the challenge?! Grab your hose and slap on your combat boots; fires don’t wait for anybody. NY City FireFighter includes brigade truck driving, parking, and action play. Race through city roads with your team in a quick fashion. Evade traffic and keep pedestrians safe. Use your parking skills to avoid clashing with city vehicles. Next, embark on several rescue missions in different locations. There will be shopping malls, banks, schools, office buildings, and even hospitals to rescue! Drive your fire truck to a HOT location and COOL it down! Locate fire points using your radar to rescue within given time and get maximum mission completion points. As you progress within the game, levels will become more interesting and challenging!NY City FireFighter 2017 Features:•Amazing visual and Cool sounds effects•Super thrilling Firefighter Missions to complete•Numbers of Firefighters Trucks and ambulances•New York City Environment with Cool 3D Graphics•Numbers of Animated People to Rescue•Smooth, Easy & Addictive GameplayAbout Tap2Play:Tap2Play, LLC is a wholly owned subsidiary of Tapinator, Inc.Tapinator Inc. (Ticker: TAPM) develops and publishes games on mobile platforms. The Company’s portfolio includes over 250 mobile gaming titles that, collectively, have achieved over 350 million player downloads. Tapinator is headquartered in New York. For more info, visit Tapinator.com.

comments: Game is awesome! Butt! It would be better if I could replay my amazing shots lol.  And a better aimer that's not so close to the edge of the screen would be nice. Still a pretty awesome game though,  in my opinion. Probably ridiculously hard for some of you who aren't as good as me but we can't all be pro lmao

Its a great game but the ads on the top of the screen during gameplay aren't cool. It messes with my shots. If you get rid of that I'll give a 5 ☆ rating. I understand that when a game is free the company needs to add ads to make money, but during gameplay on the screen is a little extensive. I don't usually give anything less than five stars,  I'm genuinely sorry. A quick reply would be much appreciated, thanks for your time.

The same ad ran, after every other level, just too much. I would never dl the advertised game due to it being shoved at me repeatedly. Not much in creativity, a lot of the same scenes just a move of the cup or an added piece. Uninstalled before I get further annoyed.

Ruined by ads Well.. I quite liked the game until I finished the first level.. then ads... ads... and more bloody ads... do not get this if you like your game play to be fluid!!!!!  If you like to play a game for 10 seconds then watch 30 seconds of ads every level.. then this game is for you.. I have now uninstalled it.. if I could give minus stars then I would

Fun game, but advertisements are WAAAAAY too frequent to actually enjoy the game (practically every 3rd round). Install if you'd like or don't mind ads all the time, but I didn't make it before deciding to uninstall. Game is absolutely in no way new or ground breaking so you'd be better off with any of the other similar games with far fewer forced ads.

I said if one more add comes up, I'm deleting this game. There is literally a 1 minute add after every single level. This game sucks so bad. I kept my word and uninstalled it. DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS. It's not worth it at all.

descriptionHTML:
Meet the continuation of the game series Survival in the Ocean!
You are person who survived after airplane crash in deep ocean. No one around could help you. On the horizon is not visible land. Around only the ocean and hungry sharks.

But fortunately, the boxes that were left behind after the plane crash are passing by! You have a hook with you! You can collect these boxes - they can have many useful resources and items.

You should watch over your health and at the time of eating. At the top of the screen are indicators of health, satiety and oxygen levels. Take food to replenish your health. You can go fishing and then cook your food at the stake. So you can live longer.

Dive into the water - there are many interesting things! Beware of dangerous hungry sharks. Craft a powerful tool in the workbench to protect yourself from sharks. Collect seaweed on the ocean floor, look for hiding places. From algae you can make a very nutritious soup!

Make your raft as big as you can! Collect different resources. Use them to craft new items. Use the workbench and oven to open new recipes for craft.

Ocean Survival 3D - 2 features:
- Ultimate ocean survival simulator
- Life on raft
- Dangerous underwater world
- Easy learning craft system
- Optimized graphics
- Realistic visual effects

Dive into deep ocean, explore underwater world! It's time to survive with Ocean Survival 3D - 2!

- new visual effects - realistic water and weather

summary: You on raft. Survive on raft in ocean. Build, craft, use hook, dive and explore!
title: Ocean Survival 3D - 2

description: Have you ever wondered what it is like to be Wild Cheetah? Now you finally have a chance to know that feeling! Join the battle in this super epic adventure delivered in stunning 3D. descriptionHTML:
Have you ever wondered what it is like to be Wild Cheetah? Now you finally have a chance to know that feeling! Join the battle in this super epic adventure delivered in stunning 3D. Be a Wild Cheetah and survive in the wilderness as long as you can. Start your own family of cheetahs, fight against fierce animals like lion, crocodile and rhino. Evolve your Cheetah to become the strongest Cheetah ever.

FEATURES:

REALISTIC SIMULATOR
Maintain your health and energy by eating and drinking water, raise your family, explore massive world, fight other animals to become more powerful

START YOUR FAMILY
Wild Cheetah Sim features the ability to have real family. Family members are not only good companions but they can be trained to fight along side in combat

REAL DAY AND NIGHT
Wild Cheetah Sim has a real in-game cycle of day and night on a 24 hour based time system. For every 24 minutes that the game is played, a full day and night cycle of 24 hours passes in the game

ACHIEVEMENTS
The game features achievement system. Unlock the achievements by hunting specific animals and discover amazing facts about Cheetah.


ADDITIONAL FEATURES
- RPG-style gameplay: level up, evolve, complete quests
- Different options of appearance for cheetah
- Information tab in game menu to view characteristics of animals
- Rotatable camera, zoom in and out
- Realistic environments, big world
- A lot of real animals to hunt
- Quest system, 20 missions to complete
- Awesome 3D graphics

Follow us on Facebook:
https://www.facebook.com/turborocketgames

Follow us on Twitter:
https://twitter.com/TurboRocketGame

Follow us in Vkontakte:
http://vk.com/turborocketgames

Have fun playing Wild Cheetah Sim!

We are getting happier with each of your email message.

Please note, that we are no way affiliated with any other animal simulator games developed by other game companies.

Thanks!

comments: As I have not heard of this game (it showed up in my recommendations), I would like to say that this game is beautiful! I do recommend other people to play it. The graphics are highly amazing and basic control is outstanding! I love the idea on how you can pick up items that you put down and rearrange your base the way you want it. Although, I did have several connection issues, but overall everything is in tiptop condition. Keep up the good work!

It's a pretty fun game, I enjoy it more than Last Day on Earth. Unfortunately like many people, I find the energy system lacking. I understand the need to have it as developers but it makes the game hard to play more than once or twice a day. If you could implement an increase in energy through leveling it would made progression more worthwhile and keep people playing longer. It doesn't have to be a huge increase either, maybe one energy point per lever or even everyother level.

I love the game, the crafting system is awesome, the gameplay is great. However, there are some points that I suggest  1. Nerf the Damned, also the Lepers, they are strong for beginners. Club or Cart Thills can't beat them easily 2. Make another way to find leek seeds 3. Lepers can detect you sneaking to them, and they spawn out of nowhere. I don't know if it is a bug to me or not. 4. Cooking meat uses too much wood.  I look forward for more updates. It's a great game to be honest.  Edit: I love the events, especially the cart one.

It's a good attempt but too easy to die. No water. Seriously? I have an empty bottle yet nothing to put in it. I would like the chance to explore and build BEFORE I die five times and can't reclaim the stuff I've spent time collecting.  If these things are remedied I'll try again. Till then, deleting.

I normally dont make reviews on games that i play unless it is really good. I love the hardcore atmosphere of the game,reminds me of the good old days when i still like playing minecraft. My only complaint is that the spawn rates for the undead e.g leepers, templars are too high in my opinion. Other than that. This is a great game

Honestly it's a great game and lots of fun but that energy mechanic needs to change. I know you can walk but it's still such a strange thing to gate your players out of playing.  Maybe if you could always travel at the same speed but if you didn't spend energy you could be attacked randomly while you travel. Or if energy was used to speed up crafting. I dunno but it's the only thing holding me back from a perfect score.
description: Grim Soul is a free-to-play dark fantasy survival MMORPG. A once-prosperous Imperial province, the Plaguelands are now covered in fear and darkness. Its inhabitants have turned into endlessly wandering souls. Your goal is to survive as long as you can in this dangerous land. Collect resources, build a fortress, defend yourself from enemies, and survive combat with zombie-knights and other monsters in this new Souls-like game!● EXPLORE NEW LANDSExplore lands afflicted by the Grey Decay. Discover mysterious Places of Power. Try infiltrating ancient dungeons and other survivors’ castles to obtain the most valuable resources.● LEARN CRAFTINGBuild workbenches and craft new resources. Discover new designs and create realistic medieval weapons and armor to battle with the Plaguelands’ most dangerous inhabitants.● IMPROVE YOUR CASTLEBuild a sound foundation for defenses against the undead and other survivors. Defend your citadel, construct and place traps for uninvited guests. But don’t forget to explore your enemies’ territory to collect valuable loot.● DEFEAT ENEMIESMorning star? Halberd? Maybe an arbalet? Choose from an arsenal of deadly weapons. Deal critical hits and evade enemy attacks. Use different fighting styles. Find an effective strategy for wielding every type of weapon!● SADDLE YOUR HORSEBuild a stable and don’t miss your chance to gallop into battle against hordes of undead on your war horse or ride through a grim medieval landscape. You can build a boat, a cart, and even a carriage - if you can obtain the necessary parts.● OVERCOME HARDSHIPLife in the Plaguelands is solitary, poor, nasty, brutish and short. Hunger and thirst will kill you faster than cold steel in this sinister medieval MMORPG. Conquer nature, hunt dangerous animals, prepare their meat over an open fire, or kill other survivors to replenish your reserves.● BEFRIEND THE RAVENSBuild a raven cage and these smart birds will be your messengers. Watch the skies. Ravens always circle over something of interest. And that which ravens take interest in will always be of interest for a lonely Exile.● JOIN A CLANA clan will increase your chances of surviving one more day in this cruel and bitter medieval world. Call your brothers in arms to cut down damned knights and bloodthirsty witches.● PREPARE FOR THE NIGHTWhen night descends, darkness floods the world, and you’ll need light to escape the terrifying Night Guest.● RECEIVE REWARDSYou may feel alone, but you are not. There’s always something to do. Complete quests that bring ravens and receive rewards. Take every chance - that’s the best strategy for survival in the grim reality of this forgotten kingdom.● SOLVE THE MYSTERYSearch for letters and scrolls to learn about the Empire’s ancient history. Find keys to solving the mystery of your past and the truth behind this unfolding catastrophe.Life in the Plaguelands is a constant battle not only with hunger and thirst but with hordes of undead and cursed beasts. Conquer nature and fight in this action RPG for real heroes. Become a legend! Storm enemy castles, collect loot, and rule the Plaguelands from an iron throne!Grim Soul is a free-to-play MMORPG, but it contains in-game items that can be purchased. You must be at least 13 years of age to download this game and begin your adventures in Grim Soul. Your strategy for survival will determine everything. Begin your journey and become a hero in a brutal game for fearless warriors.
descriptionHTML:
Grim Soul is a free-to-play dark fantasy survival MMORPG. A once-prosperous Imperial province, the Plaguelands are now covered in fear and darkness. Its inhabitants have turned into endlessly wandering souls. Your goal is to survive as long as you can in this dangerous land. Collect resources, build a fortress, defend yourself from enemies, and survive combat with zombie-knights and other monsters in this new Souls-like game!

● EXPLORE NEW LANDS

Explore lands afflicted by the Grey Decay. Discover mysterious Places of Power. Try infiltrating ancient dungeons and other survivors’ castles to obtain the most valuable resources.

● LEARN CRAFTING

Build workbenches and craft new resources. Discover new designs and create realistic medieval weapons and armor to battle with the Plaguelands’ most dangerous inhabitants.

● IMPROVE YOUR CASTLE

Build a sound foundation for defenses against the undead and other survivors. Defend your citadel, construct and place traps for uninvited guests. But don’t forget to explore your enemies’ territory to collect valuable loot.

● DEFEAT ENEMIES

Morning star? Halberd? Maybe an arbalet? Choose from an arsenal of deadly weapons. Deal critical hits and evade enemy attacks. Use different fighting styles. Find an effective strategy for wielding every type of weapon!

● SADDLE YOUR HORSE

Build a stable and don’t miss your chance to gallop into battle against hordes of undead on your war horse or ride through a grim medieval landscape. You can build a boat, a cart, and even a carriage - if you can obtain the necessary parts.

● OVERCOME HARDSHIP

Life in the Plaguelands is solitary, poor, nasty, brutish and short. Hunger and thirst will kill you faster than cold steel in this sinister medieval MMORPG. Conquer nature, hunt dangerous animals, prepare their meat over an open fire, or kill other survivors to replenish your reserves.

● BEFRIEND THE RAVENS

Build a raven cage and these smart birds will be your messengers. Watch the skies. Ravens always circle over something of interest. And that which ravens take interest in will always be of interest for a lonely Exile.

● JOIN A CLAN

A clan will increase your chances of surviving one more day in this cruel and bitter medieval world. Call your brothers in arms to cut down damned knights and bloodthirsty witches.

● PREPARE FOR THE NIGHT

When night descends, darkness floods the world, and you’ll need light to escape the terrifying Night Guest.

● RECEIVE REWARDS

You may feel alone, but you are not. There’s always something to do. Complete quests that bring ravens and receive rewards. Take every chance - that’s the best strategy for survival in the grim reality of this forgotten kingdom.

● SOLVE THE MYSTERY

Search for letters and scrolls to learn about the Empire’s ancient history. Find keys to solving the mystery of your past and the truth behind this unfolding catastrophe.


Life in the Plaguelands is a constant battle not only with hunger and thirst but with hordes of undead and cursed beasts. Conquer nature and fight in this action RPG for real heroes. Become a legend! Storm enemy castles, collect loot, and rule the Plaguelands from an iron throne!

Grim Soul is a free-to-play MMORPG, but it contains in-game items that can be purchased. You must be at least 13 years of age to download this game and begin your adventures in Grim Soul. Your strategy for survival will determine everything. Begin your journey and become a hero in a brutal game for fearless warriors.
recentChanges: — Invisible character issue on some devices is fixed
— Game progress saving system is improved
— Rare case with empty event chests is fixed
— An issue with other exiles' corpses disappearance is fixed
— The Night Guest now comes later and less frequently
summary: Survive as long as you can. Craft your weapons and battle against cursed souls.
title: Grim Soul: Dark Fantasy Survival

comments: This game was my favorite of any maybe ever. I played all the time, then there was an update and I had to uninstall. It made the app close constantly (even when it wasn't even open and I was in other apps), there's way too many ads that make me want to vomit, and it stats to lag now when it never did before. Someone at corporate ruined this game. Smh.

Smooth control. Awesome idea . Not Much more I can say about it.(First Review). Now, my first thoughts about this game was that it was very good but as I have updated the game it has just been very slow and overturns when you tap. It also randomly takes you to the play store without tapping on an ad.

The game itself is pretty fun. I think I'd like it. But the ads are far, far too intrusive. Not only are there too many. But, many of them have timers. Some are 30 seconds, and you can't break out. Too annoying. I have no interest I sitting and waiting for ads to finish

Very enjoyable game, quite addictive and jumping back into a new game is quick. Couple of gripes, there seems to be some slow down or framrate dipping after an ad has shown and the option to remove ads isn't working. Sort this out and it will get another 2 stars

Wow!!!! I've never been more annoyed with an app in my life!!! I would play this game all day long but the amount of ads are literally driving me insane! Two runs and another 15 second ad comes up. No thanks

The game was awesome and I loved it. But the latest update ruined it with ADS. They put the banner exactly where you mostly tap with the fingers to change direction, the game got laggy which it was not before and has started getting way too many pop ups. Uninstalling. *Sigh*

comments: This is an amazing game, but it has pros and some cons. PROS: This game has too many pros to list (two of the pros are that it's very realistic, and there's a sandbox). CONS: Engine noise that is different for each vehicle would be nice, but at least not every vehicle has the same sound. Sometimes certain "crews" (AKA Skins) don't apply to certain vehicles. It says you fell of the world when you fall off of the world.

Great game and the best part is it's free!! The only thing I can see that could use some improvement are the controls... and it wouldn't hurt to be able to change the point of view... other than that I say "jolly good show" as I tip my hat to the creators!

Way too many ads. Not just ads, it's that annoying video-kind of ad you have to watch X seconds before you can skip. After every single level. Even in the tutorial, where you need about 30 secs - 1 minute per level.

The ads never stop! videos you can't skip, two ads in between every level, you can't even exit the app with two more ads popping up and having to wait for them to close. Developer should've taken less money to make the gameplay better.

Fun for 3 minutes, then i saw the same ad ten times in a row. OMG. I get it, you have to make money, but this is ridiculous. The forced ads are unbearable. If i wanted to install Terminator wars, Clash of Clans or Bubble Witch Saga, i would have done it already.

Loved the start and finish. Got away from me a little with the desert levels... and the random water levels at the end of the city map. Would've loved more loading and unloading of trucks and as well as the construction arc you sometimes saw with buildings going up.

comments: I kind of enjoy the game but would like it more if there were cheaper options to buying. After you buy some the prices jump to 99.99 and have yet to see cheaper prices. I'm not unloading that in one go. The people of this game would probably make more money if they bring cheaper prices. I would buy several different little packs that eventually add up to 100 bit you ain't getting nothing otherwise. Also wish you could buy more things with the gold you purchased. Like have a choice to spend loyalty or gold

I started this game when it first came out. There were hardly any game advantages and everyone was having fun and on the same playing field. As more and more packages got released into the game it became a pay to win situation. I personally do not think spending $100+ on a phone game is a wise investment. Thus I enjoyed the game by taking advantage of their events and the prizes within the game. However, it has become dominated by people who payed to be the big guy and the little people get absolutely demolished. It has taken the fun out of playing, which really dissapoints me as it was a fun game to play.

This game has potential to be fun but it's completely ruined because IT'S COMPLETELY PAY-TO-WIN which sucked the fun out of the game that I quit. Don't get me wrong, Final Fantasy is highly respected RPG franchise because it's full of great games in the series. But no this one.  However, I might come back if the game developers make it not as pay-to-win as it is now. Right now, it's a complete money bucket!

This game is great and fun, I love spending my time playing this game. One problem though, what is going on with the packages? Why is it every time a package is bought all the packages go from 20 to 100 dollars ? We should be able to buy the 20 dollar packages more than once! Is that fixable? Please cuz i do want to keep playing but 100 dollars is too much.

The game is very addictive and fun to play. Some of the people playing the game are wonderful and fun to game with. Graphics are very good for a on line game played on phone, tablet or computer. The quests are challenging at best. BUT!!! BE WARNED... This game is not for young children as there is explicit language and cut throat people playing the game. After all it is a war game and nothing more. Now down to the nitty-gritty of the game. Yes it's free, but that only get you so far before you will need to buy packs in the game to advance and unlock the two new characters. The game quests are designed for people to spend if you want to get ahead fast. Large amounts of  $$$$$$ Cash are needed to play this game. $$$$$$ Personal note, I know people who have spent thousands on this game. Over all the game is great for young adults on up. PG-15

I absolutely LOVE my guild!!! Everyone is so cool,from all over the States & all over the world...have friends in other guilds as well from all over the world...my guild is like my "family"...some of us have even talked about meeting up with each other...I hope to finally meet some of my favorite people,especially our guild leader...we're like the best of friends!!! Although,he lives in TX & I'm from Michigan,we're both married ,but there's nothing I wouldn't do for him!!! Thanks so much for giving me this opportunity to meet such wonderful people!! Lifelong friends/family!!! 💜

comments: This game was great for the first few levels, and then some frustrations set in about the design. Some levels are just tough to see which tracks go where because of the nature of the isometric view, but the real deal breaker for me is having to click the arrow to switch a track path. Why can't this be a lever to the side of the track, especially when two path switches overlap? Countless times I've accidentally stopped a train on an intersection instead of switching the track for the next train. It tests your patience instead of your multitasking and tracking abilities. The ads are very, very plentiful. I urge you to continue using the free version if you want to support the devs because they probably get more revenue from ads in the long run than the $5 cost to remove the ads. Potentially great.

Awesome game. Very nice controls but greedy devs. I spend money in games but to pay 59 sek just to remove ads is too much. And too many ads which spoils the otherwise great game. Either reduce the cost to remove ads or include other benefits to the same cost. The frequency of ads should be reduced.

Fun gameplay, but a bit buggy and confusing when a train is near a switch since you often stop a train when trying to switch it. Difficulty ramps up to insanely unfair after the first few levels. Since the passengers spawn at random even when you're absolutely perfect at switching the trains you still don't often get 3 stars on the level. Getting 3 stars on a level is basically luck at that point.

Rigged gameplay. I made it thru several levels until I tapped on the train and it didnt stop, resulting in a crash, further resulting in a 30 second ad that I couldn't escape. How convenient. I have noticed more and more developers finding ever-newer ways to slip ads into the games.
Hadn't played it for a while, went back and it had deleted all my progress. Not going to start again, so deleting the app

This game was honestly amazing. I love how it's such a simple game yet it's so much fun to play. The low poly graphics and the music really synchronized and make it so much more better. Even the tutorial, it integrates into the game in a very interesting manner. The only problem was that it lags a bit, but otherwise Northplay, loved it!
description: Conduct THIS! Is an adictive game of explosive railway action that will challenge your inner conductor.  Set in a stunning world, with incredibly simple controls you race against time to bring passengers safely to their destination by commanding trains, switching tracks and avoiding collisions in increasingly challenging action-puzzles.  As you progress you unlock new trains, gain access to new beautiful and mysterious regions and earn awards.  • Conduct trains in beautiful low-poly 3D worlds • Simple and intuitive gameplay for everyone, just tap to start/stop trains and control switches • Transport passengers, earn coins and unlock new themed regions • Unlock trains found in the real world, such as the French TGV and Japanese Shinkansen, to expand your train collection • Seriously challenging puzzles in clever levels that will push you to the limit • Earn awards for completing regions and marvel at your success in the company HQ • Share your most explosive crashes with your friends • Fantastic soundtrack by composer Simon Kölle
descriptionHTML:
Conduct THIS! Is an adictive game of explosive railway action that will challenge your inner conductor.

Set in a stunning world, with incredibly simple controls you race against time to bring passengers safely to their destination by commanding trains, switching tracks and avoiding collisions in increasingly challenging action-puzzles.

As you progress you unlock new trains, gain access to new beautiful and mysterious regions and earn awards.

comments: Love it but Ive been playing it for a while now but out of no where it keeps saying unfortunately loop taxi has stopped. It won't let me play it at all. I'm going to try to uninstall and reinstall and see if that work's. I had most of the vehicles,working my way to get all of them.4 tickets and loved this game but it keeps closing out all of a sudden. And the split second I can play it now I have to start all over from the beginning. Come on man,I put hard work, love and compassion in this game. PLEASE HELP

Almost had me I love it, but I looked at the achievements and saw that you needed to buy certain cars to unlock the achievement. I thought, okay, I can deal with grinding to get in game coins to buy a vehicle. But the only way to purchase those cars is with real money ($25 each) and not in-game currency. A game where you have to literally pay to win is not fun, and leaves no point to playing if the intent is to unlock all the things and accomplish all the achievements if it means spending $50 to buy virtual vehicles.

Im currently sat here with all this cash after buying all levels and all vehicles. Their needs to be an option to modify vehicles so you can make them faster and have more seats. The tap does not allways work and when it does you hit somethong. Needs improvement but a good concept. Maybe even a longer road to cross or an never ending level to see how far you can get theres the option to add different modes of gameplay. But really needs work at the moment.

descriptionHTML:
Pick up passengers as a taxi driver, race your way carefully in traffic and drop off passengers at the next bus stop. The more passengers you transport, the more gold you earn!

description: ▪ Fight with friends for highest online score!▪ Randomly created levels (never play the same thing twice!)▪ Challenging scenarios!▪ Destructible environment!▪ Awesome roster of heroes with unique abilities!▪ Many clever enemies!▪ Seriously Fun obstacles!▪ Unlock lots of funny characters!▪ Share videos or photos of your best moments!Star in the galaxy's most epic endless road crossing game!Super challenging, but fun for any age!*** Galactic Road Crossing ***This game packs tons of the things you've come to love about road crossing games but ups the ante x 2! Galaxy Hoppers improves upon our other crossy games with multi-planet exploration and fully destructible environments! We guarantee that this is the most epic, most fun, most challenging crossy game in the galaxy! Sure there are cars, road, rivers and logs, but now throw in aliens, robot wars, ice monsters, fire traps, space ships and a fully destructible environment!*** Hop Across the Stars ***Blast across the galaxy from one star to the next. You'll find yourself voyaging across multiple planets each with it's own challenges! Run through the fire traps of the lava planet! Slice through the forrest jungle avoiding racing speeders and mech warrior bots! Hop through the sand alien wars quickly avoiding the stampeding Sand Mammoths and giant worm pits! Hop for your life across the frozen world before the ice monster awakens! Freely-hopping enemies will close in on your location and force you to react quickly. Can you survive and claim the top score or will the Galactic Wars take you?*** Compete with Friends ***Compete with your friends online for the highest score and prove that you are the greatest survivor in your solar system. Check your score regularly and improve your game. Show your friends who the real star is. Climb to the top of the online Google Play leaderboard while you force their scores downwards! As you level up and improve your roster of characters you'll become unstoppable!*** Funny Characters ***There are tons of funny characters to unlock! Each one has their own unique ability. Deflect lasers as the sabre wielding space ninja or blast away alien after alien with smuggler's blaster sidearm. Each time you play your character will gain Experience Points moving you from level 1 to 2 to 3 and so on. Levelling up will unlock new characters with new abilities. Unlock all characters to complete your own unstoppable galactic force!This is a super fun, lovingly crafted game. And best of all it's totally free!Welcome to the world's crossy-est space wars shooter game!
descriptionHTML:
▪ Fight with friends for highest online score!
▪ Randomly created levels (never play the same thing twice!)
▪ Challenging scenarios!
▪ Destructible environment!
▪ Awesome roster of heroes with unique abilities!
▪ Many clever enemies!
▪ Seriously Fun obstacles!
▪ Unlock lots of funny characters!
▪ Share videos or photos of your best moments!

Star in the galaxy's most epic endless road crossing game!
Super challenging, but fun for any age!

*** Galactic Road Crossing ***
This game packs tons of the things you've come to love about road crossing games but ups the ante x 2! Galaxy Hoppers improves upon our other crossy games with multi-planet exploration and fully destructible environments! We guarantee that this is the most epic, most fun, most challenging crossy game in the galaxy! Sure there are cars, road, rivers and logs, but now throw in aliens, robot wars, ice monsters, fire traps, space ships and a fully destructible environment!

*** Hop Across the Stars ***
Blast across the galaxy from one star to the next. You'll find yourself voyaging across multiple planets each with it's own challenges! Run through the fire traps of the lava planet! Slice through the forrest jungle avoiding racing speeders and mech warrior bots! Hop through the sand alien wars quickly avoiding the stampeding Sand Mammoths and giant worm pits! Hop for your life across the frozen world before the ice monster awakens! Freely-hopping enemies will close in on your location and force you to react quickly. Can you survive and claim the top score or will the Galactic Wars take you?

*** Compete with Friends ***
Compete with your friends online for the highest score and prove that you are the greatest survivor in your solar system. Check your score regularly and improve your game. Show your friends who the real star is. Climb to the top of the online Google Play leaderboard while you force their scores downwards! As you level up and improve your roster of characters you'll become unstoppable!

*** Funny Characters ***
There are tons of funny characters to unlock! Each one has their own unique ability. Deflect lasers as the sabre wielding space ninja or blast away alien after alien with smuggler's blaster sidearm. Each time you play your character will gain Experience Points moving you from level 1 to 2 to 3 and so on. Levelling up will unlock new characters with new abilities. Unlock all characters to complete your own unstoppable galactic force!

This is a super fun, lovingly crafted game. And best of all it's totally free!
Welcome to the world's crossy-est space wars shooter game!

description: Just Freeskiing is a highly authentic ski/freeski simulation with sheer endless possibilities to tweak, style and combine realistic tricks!The numerous Slopestyle, Halfpipe, Big-Air, Jibbing (Rails, Boxes) and Backcountry challenge locations are covering a huge variety of freeskiing.The game features a powerful yet simple steering technology with supportive in-game tutorials and simple buttons for beginners and advanced possibilities (2x taps, swipes, etc.) as well as enhancements (Grab-Trick-Packages) for Pro’s.Summarized, the aim of the game is to beat the world’s best scores and to master given challenges in order to improve your overall skiing skills.Let’s go and give it a try !!FEATURES- Finest freeskiing action sports simulation- Halfpipe, Slopestyle, Park, Slopes and Backcountry- „Real Resort“ Level: LAAX, Switzerland- 5 unique levels with a total of 38 spots- 4 Customizable male & female characters- Several skis to choose from- Challenge, Competition and Training mode- Beat the World’s Best Scores- Tilt- or virtual joystick navigation- Replay option- English and German languageTRICK POSSIBILITIESSlope: Ollie, Revert, Powerslide, PowerturnSlides: 50-50, Slide, Nosepress, Tailpress, Noseslide, TailslideTricks/Grabs: Safety L/R, Nosegrab L/R, Tailgrab L/R, Double-Hand Nosegrab, Double-Hand-Tailgrab, Mute L/R,Octo L/R, Japan L/R, LS Shifty, RS ShiftyRotations: LS Spins, RS Spins, SW LS Spins, SW RS Spins, Frontflips, Backflips, Rodeos, Misty Flips, Corked SpinsOPTIMIZEDThe game graphics are optimized for newer and powerful device. Graphics quality and performance may vary depending on your device.IN APP PURCHASESThe game offers an In-App purchase for each level to get permanent and unlimited access. To get access to all Trick-Buttons and more Grab-Tricks, there is a Grab-Package In-App purchase within the game.MORE ACTION SPORTS GAMESFor more Freestyle Ski games, Freeski games and Snowboard games, please visit our website rndrln-games.comIMPORTANT NOTICEIf you experience any problems with the game or in case you have any questions or comments, please contact us directly - support(at)randerline.com.
descriptionHTML:
Just Freeskiing is a highly authentic ski/freeski simulation with sheer endless possibilities to tweak, style and combine realistic tricks!
The numerous Slopestyle, Halfpipe, Big-Air, Jibbing (Rails, Boxes) and Backcountry challenge locations are covering a huge variety of freeskiing.

The game features a powerful yet simple steering technology with supportive in-game tutorials and simple buttons for beginners and advanced possibilities (2x taps, swipes, etc.) as well as enhancements (Grab-Trick-Packages) for Pro’s.

Summarized, the aim of the game is to beat the world’s best scores and to master given challenges in order to improve your overall skiing skills.

Let’s go and give it a try !!


FEATURES
- Finest freeskiing action sports simulation
- Halfpipe, Slopestyle, Park, Slopes and Backcountry
- „Real Resort“ Level: LAAX, Switzerland
- 5 unique levels with a total of 38 spots
- 4 Customizable male & female characters
- Several skis to choose from
- Challenge, Competition and Training mode
- Beat the World’s Best Scores
- Tilt- or virtual joystick navigation
- Replay option
- English and German language


TRICK POSSIBILITIES
Slope: Ollie, Revert, Powerslide, Powerturn
Slides: 50-50, Slide, Nosepress, Tailpress, Noseslide, Tailslide
Tricks/Grabs: Safety L/R, Nosegrab L/R, Tailgrab L/R, Double-Hand Nosegrab, Double-Hand-Tailgrab, Mute L/R,Octo L/R, Japan L/R, LS Shifty, RS Shifty
Rotations: LS Spins, RS Spins, SW LS Spins, SW RS Spins, Frontflips, Backflips, Rodeos, Misty Flips, Corked Spins


OPTIMIZED
The game graphics are optimized for newer and powerful device. Graphics quality and performance may vary depending on your device.


IN APP PURCHASES
The game offers an In-App purchase for each level to get permanent and unlimited access. To get access to all Trick-Buttons and more Grab-Tricks, there is a Grab-Package In-App purchase within the game.


MORE ACTION SPORTS GAMES
For more Freestyle Ski games, Freeski games and Snowboard games, please visit our website rndrln-games.com


IMPORTANT NOTICE
If you experience any problems with the game or in case you have any questions or comments, please contact us directly - support(at)randerline.com.
developerAddress:
Via Sulé 6
CH-7017 Flims Dorf
Switzerland
summary: A skiing simulation featuring Slopestyle, Halfpipe, Big Air and Backcountry
title: Just Freeskiing - Freestyle Ski Action

description: There's a Jerk in every office. A know-it-all, overachiever who comes in early, stays late and kisses up to the boss. Exact revenge on “that guy” with Office Jerk: grab whatever you can find, and hurl it at him!The Office Jerk can only take so much - find out how much by throwing:    ★ Zombie Mask    ★ Fire Extinguisher    ★ Cheesy Button    ★ Snappy Mouse Trap    ★ Fish Bowl, complete with Goldfish    ★ Sloppy, Spicy Taco    ★ Sweet, Vanilla Ice Cream Cone    ★ Nice, Blue Water balloon    ★ Stick O' Dynamite    ★ Yummy Cupcake with Sprinkles    ★ Crumpled Piece of Paper    ★ Shiny Red Stapler    ★ Suction Cup Dart - Always Classic, Always Funny    ★ Pipe Wrench    ★ Soda Pop!...and a whole bunch more, plus mystery items! Don't just sit back and take it: pay it back. Grab whatever feels right, and fling it at his head or shoulder - or go right for the face! Tap the desk organizer and see what other items you can rain down on that office meanie. comments: I like this game. Got good physics good range of cars and tracks. The only things it needs it better camera angles they are sloppy and makes the car unpredictable also a manual feature would be awesome. But over all a very entertaining game with heaps of content.

Great game. A lot better than other drifting games I've tried in the past. It's pretty difficult and frustrating at times but if you know what you're doing it's a really enjoyable game. But there is one thing that really bothers me, I noticed that in one of the amateur challenges it says 4wd, but it isn't 4wd it's AWD there's a difference.

Not as good as when it first came out. The graphics back then were so much better, with the motion blur and all. Bring back more graphic options and this game will be so much better and nicer looking. Motion blur makes the speed look more accurate.

The game itself is great, but more car  customization, such as parts that actually affect performance, would be nice. A few other quality of life issues such as long loading screens, an awkward menu, and a laggy menu are pretty annoying. Still, gameplay is fantastic.

Where do you get the special events car for today(14 /2/18 - Silvia with vinyls), and  professional league qualifying cup car(Blue NSX) from?  They are not in the car selection,  meaning we cant progress forward
Pretty terrible. The game isn't realistic at all compared to real life drifting. Camera is messed up and annoying. And the sound of the exhausts and engines are not accurate at all
