comments: The lag doe

I love this game because of how simple yet in depth everything is. There are lots of game modes and choices to customise your tank, which I love! One thing that could be added is an offline mode where you play against bots. Again great work and I am excited to see how this game will improve because already it is almost perfect. If you are thinking of downloading it, I recommend you do! As long as you have fairly good Internet you should be OK, there is a little bit of lag but that only happens when you spam the fire button too much.

What a great game! Forget the haters who say its laggy, just because they don't want to blame it on their wifi. I like how it is so simple, yet exciting and fast paced. Good graphics, great gameplay, and good controls. To make it even better, please add a bouncy, funky backing track to really put the player in the tank. Also the game can freeze occasionally, so debug that if you can. Side note: you do have to reach over a bit too much to upgrade, but don't let my cons sidetrack you from a GREAT GAME!!!!!!!!!

Almost perfect. If you have good wifi, then your gameplay is 👌. If you have mobile service, it works just as smooth with full bars. But on team mode it keeps spawning me and it lags so much becuase there is literally a wall of tanks shoting. I have one suggestuin though, can you ad an offline mode? If you do I will rate 5 stars on everything. That's all😀

This is just like the pc version, but if you try to play with a mouse connected to your phone it will only allow the mouse to control targeting or moving. Also it won't allow you to use your thumb with it on the screen to control something else. But I if this were to be fixed then maybe the game would be more fun!

Well... After all  my review is: Its a good game good graphics and fun but the lag is big!! And you should really add new tanks....... BT thats why I didnt rate five stars.. PS if u see me on diep.io wiggle for team 😊
description: From the creator of Agar.io, the newest online smash hit game comes to mobile! Upgrade your tank, shoot down other players and reach the top of the leaderboard!Shoot and destroy blocks and other players to earn XP, level up your tank and unlock new classes, weapons and abilities! Will you choose the rapid-fire machine gun, control a swarm of guided missiles, shoot in all directions or something else? MASSIVELY MULTIPLAYER ONLINE ACTION!Play with dozens of other players at once on huge servers packed with excitement!MOVE, SHOOT AND SURVIVE!Destroy blocks and other players to gain XP, but don’t get shot down yourself! descriptionHTML:
From the creator of Agar.io, the newest online smash hit game comes to mobile! Upgrade your tank, shoot down other players and reach the top of the leaderboard!

Shoot and destroy blocks and other players to earn XP, level up your tank and unlock new classes, weapons and abilities! Will you choose the rapid-fire machine gun, control a swarm of guided missiles, shoot in all directions or something else?

MASSIVELY MULTIPLAYER ONLINE ACTION!
Play with dozens of other players at once on huge servers packed with excitement!

MOVE, SHOOT AND SURVIVE!
Destroy blocks and other players to gain XP, but don’t get shot down yourself! Stay safe out there!

LEVEL UP AND BOOST YOUR STATS!
Choose which stats to increase and change the way your tank plays! Do you want extra bullet damage or a fast movement speed? It’s all down to you!

CHOOSE FROM DIFFERENT TANK CLASSES!
Upgrade your tank to a new class. Machine guns, guided missiles, cannons in every direction… there’s a world of choice!

OPTIMIZED FOR MOBILE!
diep.io on mobile offers the same great experience as the hit web game, with new controls perfect for touchscreens!

KEY FEATURES
- Online multiplayer action!
- Dozens of players in each game!
- Fast-paced tank on tank warfare!
- Level up a variety of stats!
- Upgrade into many different tank classes!
- Easy to play but challenging to master!
- Free to play!


This game requires an internet connection.
Don’t miss out on the latest news:
Like diep.io on Facebook: http://facebook.com/officialdiepio
Follow us on Twitter: http://twitter.com/official_diepio

comments: So lovely! Good game. You can easily make money and food, breeding and nurturing are pretty fast, unlike other games where you'd have to wait 24 hours or more for things to be done. Interactions with dogs are amazing, thet do so many tricks! I do have some issues with notifications (as in , I never get any ) and the packs; the game freezes completely when I take free or daily packs and sometimes when I restart the game I don't get the bonus from the packs at all.. And I was never able to watch videos for free packs.That is sad, but other than that this game really deserves 5 stars.

I got this game a couple of weeks ago and with the newest update, I can't do anything. Any time I try to click on a dog, the oven to get food, or anywhere, nothing happens. It's frustrating and I don't want to get rid of this game. Fix this problem please, I am too far in this game to restart.
Really like the game but the spin wheel is a joke. Total waste of gems getting the same result each time you try again. Impossible to get more than a 2 star dog. Getting annoyed! Seems rigged to me!
Its an awesome game. Way better than i expected. So easy to earn things and breed etc. The only problem i got right now is that it wont load for some reason. But will keep trying

The game itself is fun and i like it, but its way to hard to get tokens to buy dog cards. Especially when one dog card can cost 1,000 or more tokens. Right now I'm stuck in the main quests because i can't level my dogs up enough because I can't get enough tokens without paying real money.

Wish there is a way yo can buy certain dogs with cash bc you can never land on the certain dogs, it get almost there then it does back. Wondering if you already have one of a certain breed can we plz buy the other colors to thwt breed so you can really collect other then always getting the same dog and color everytime, or atleast when you have a certain dogs renové that one from the spin so you want get everytime!!!  Plz help
description: Dog Town is a FREE pet caring simulation game where you can collect dog cards and dogs like: basset hound, Staffordshire Bull Terrier, Springer Spaniel, Boston Terrier, Labrador Retriever, Australian Shepherd, Yorkshire Terrier, Bull Terrier, Great Dane, Shnauzer, Cocker Spaniel, French Bulldog, Pomeranian, Doberman, Siberian Husky, Miniature Pinscher, Labrador, Beagle, Chihuahua, Corgi, Dachshund and other dog breeds with a large emphasis on Dog Collection and management for casual and midcore players. Players will collect dogs, train them to level them up and send them to quests for exciting in-game rewards! If you always wanted to adopt a pet, play with puppies was interested in pet rescue this is one of the best pet games for you. Each dog will have a unique character and behavior, so players will always recognize their "Sleepy" from the "Jumpy"! And what's better is that the game is in full 3D and a planned VR support coming in future updates will ensure that the immersion to the Dog Town is always at high levels!Start collecting your dogs now and show your own collection to the world!FEATURES★ Gorgeous 3D environment! ★ Realistic Dogs with lifelike behavior! ★ Breed and groom your own Dog Collection!★ Level up your dogs and send them to quests!★ Decorate your rooms with hundreds of decorations!★ More than 60 dogs to collect and more to come!PLEASE NOTE!This game is still in early development.And a network connection is required.UPCOMING FEATURES● Interaction with the dogs● Translation (German, Russian, Spanish, Portuguese and few more)● More dogs and decorations● Backyard / Minigames ● Dog dressup and competition with friendsUpcoming dog breeds: basset hound, Dachshund, Staffordshire Bull Terrier, Chihuahua, Corgi, Labrador, Beagle, Springer Spaniel, Miniature Pinscher, Boston Terrier, Labrador Retriever, Siberian Husky, Australian Shepherd, Yorkshire Terrier, Doberman,  Bull Terrier, Pomeranian,  Great Dane, Shnauzer, French Bulldog,  Cocker Spaniel and other dogs.Best dog simulation and pet rescue game ever!If you are having any problems in the game or have a great idea about it please contact gamesupport@frismos.com

description: Dinosaur World Craft Exploration:Lite - an exciting game in prehistoric cubic universe where you build, construct, create & craft - using blocks - in world! Dinosaurs (t-rex [tyrannosaurus], triceratops etc.] all around you! This lite pocket mine blocky craft game, inspired by the popular cube & voxel based pocket edition creative games, lets you craft dino world! No dragons and no survival - just prehistoric reptiles! Teenage boys and girls are welcome! Craft & build a perfect cube dinosaurs world! Exploration of world is here! Construct anything you want! Play in a creative mode with unlimited resources or mine deep into the cube dino world.Craft, and explore! Exploration of randomly generated cube prehistoric worlds, islands. Build and create amazing & perfect things from the simplest of homes to the grandest constructions! Start the adventure with “Dino Jurassic Craft Exploration”! This game will bring you only joy and relax! No dragons and survival world craft mode. Just cube jurassic craft world/island and your infinite creativity! Very quick and easy. All for free! This pocket edition (exploration) game contains: block placing, cube world, real time world craft generation. Build a dinosaur world!Craft & Explore the cube world! In this incredible and totally free game you can destroy all the blocks, collect resources, survive and build beautiful & perfect Buildings. This  pocket edition game (PE) contains a large number of different blocks with which you can craft your own cube world/Island! High resolution textures, very convenient and thoughtful game control, High FPS, without compromise! So plunge into the fantastic world of ‘Dino Jurassic Craft: Exploration & Evolution’ - with new cube worlds and adventures! Place blocks / cubes move voxels, dig and mine! Go beyond your wildest dreams, make your own cube jurassic world, mine, castle or city! Great game for adults! And teens! Transform the surface in a 3D environment in Jurassic Jungle! Build shelter, fight, grow and use blocky craft. The only limit is your imagination! Start a cube world craft! description: Mommy is out for her baby birth and you need to clean the bathroom. The bathroom should not be dirty as it is full of filth and germs. Hygiene is necessary so this game allows you to clean all the dirt and filth there is for a hygienic healthy life. The bathroom is very dirty and full of germs, and you’re the only one who can clean up all the mess. Even if you have the star girl princess Emma, she still has to clean the bathroom.There are a wide variety of cleaning tools available at your disposal so you have to select different tools and clean out the mess. In this fun filled game, you can clean the toilet by using a sponge and brush, making the toilet germs free. There are different scenes available that requires your help in cleaning them. Scenes include Toilet, shower, basin, tub and floor. The bathroom is a disaster so everything is out of its place and mommy’s going to be home very soon. It is your task to place objects at their places and make the bathroom clean and tidy before mom finds out about the mess. To make the game challenging and entertaining, mini games have been added to get the game going with fun. So don’t miss this game and be the best bathroom cleaner there is.Features:•	Clean your princess’s Emma Bathroom•	Quick shower scene cleaning, don’t let mommy find out•	Tub and Floor scene cleaning•	Place objects at their places and keep everything organized•	Mini games that you won’t find in any other bathroom clean up games

There are a wide variety of cleaning tools available at your disposal so you have to select different tools and clean out the mess. Lovely little game. Starts out easy showing you the controls/events, but quickly ramps up the puzzle. Speech bubbles get in the way of putting lines down and cause you to lose because you only had 30s to complete the level. Adding an option for a topdown view would solve this because then you could actually see all the directions instead of only 2-3 at a time. Oh and the ads suck. Can we buy a version without them?

What the game is this....everything in the game matters...the no of poles which decides the resistance...the current flow in it indicating potential difference...3 lines conduct more than 2 and single lines...the hurricanes and disconnections indicate open circuit.... I'm an electrical student...finally finished the game...this game is fantastic...just need one more such game from STATNETT...thank you for this game....the other app ohm is also good...plzz develop one more such game!!!!!!!! THE FUTURE IS DEFINITELY ELECTRIC!!!

Creating lines maneuvering needs improvement. It's hard, I have to zoom in just to get it right. But over all, it's a nice game. Now, I get to understand the complexity. Often times, we in our area simply complain about brownouts without knowing the critical planning and action being done in the background. Kudos!
Opened to just a black screen that played music. Absolutely no indication that anything was happening. My screen might as well have been locked, except I could still swipe in the notification bar
description: Without electricity there is chaos. Balance is a free puzzle game about electricity and power grids. Your goal is to make sure there are no blackouts, that the power grids are functional, and that you always produce the right amount of power.The game offers many challenges you probably never thought about: - Did you know that the amount of power produced is changed all day and night to match the amount we use? - Did you know that there is a limit on how much power you can transmit through a single power line without it getting overloaded? - Did you know that an well-built power grid could have any one line disconnected without causing blackouts?You do not need any knowledge about electricity or power grids in order to enjoy this game. Balance is developed by Statnett, the system operator in the Norwegian energy system, and is based on real challenges they work with every day.
descriptionHTML:
Without electricity there is chaos. Balance is a free puzzle game about electricity and power grids. Your goal is to make sure there are no blackouts, that the power grids are functional, and that you always produce the right amount of power.

The game offers many challenges you probably never thought about:
- Did you know that the amount of power produced is changed all day and night to match the amount we use?
- Did you know that there is a limit on how much power you can transmit through a single power line without it getting overloaded?
- Did you know that an well-built power grid could have any one line disconnected without causing blackouts?
You do not need any knowledge about electricity or power grids in order to enjoy this game.

Balance is developed by Statnett, the system operator in the Norwegian energy system, and is based on real challenges they work with every day.
recentChanges: Fixed a few bugs and breaking issues with some of the levels.
summary: Balance is a puzzle game where you build and maintain the power grid.
title: Balance

comments: Love that you can now earn gems from reading.  However part of the fun of games like this is the outfits and personalization of your character. Outfits and style choices should be free to choose the best one that advances you in the story. It's not fun playing a game that forces you to fail/have a negative outcome. Big decisions/game altering choices should cost gems that makes it fun spending your savings but ultimately free outfit/style choices please

It is nice that they let the readers write their own stories.  Many of the stories written by readers are more interesting than what Episode offers... The game takes too long to load when I open it and also when it loads a story.  Then you have to sit through at least two ads just to play the story. They need to let authors be able to delete their stories.  That would probably help on the loading time. Maybe if an author wants to delete their story, they have to explain why.  Then the story could be pending deletion (and have a note for readers) until Episode decides to accept or decline.

I am a thin girl but it would be a whole lot more to stories if there were curvy girls and not totally buff guys. Speaking of males, male looks to me are more limited than female. Only in special stories are there more diverse male looks. Facial features such as freckles, or scars, moles, and other facial markings would be much appreciated. Gosh this is a lot but I really hope these can be added for a more realistic game play. I love the game and I hope this is seen and added in updates to come

description: Episode lets you LIVE your stories. One choice YOU make can change everything! The world’s largest home of visual stories where YOU choose your path. Or, become a creator and write your own! <3Wouldn’t it be amazing if YOU were a character in your favorite story? Episode lets you do just that with over 75,000 gripping stories, where you make choices that matter. From your favorite movie titles like Mean Girls to fan faves such as Bad Boy’s Girl, Episode will keep you interacting for hours.With all your favorite genres, there’s no time like the present to fall in love, rise to fame, or solve a decade-old mystery. Better yet, join this incredible community and become a creator of your own - writing stories, amassing lots of fans along the way.Join our #episodesquad for #episodelife.FOLLOW US:instagram.com/episodefacebook.com/TheEpisodeAppTHE BELLAS ARE BACK and they’re getting into deep treble. Sing in the spotlight and live out your dream of becoming a BELLA in PITCH PERFECT IN DEEP TREBLE™!You’ve always dreamed of joining the hottest acapella group in ACA-HISTORY, the Bellas! Now you’re at Barden University and it’s your time to shine. Will you be able to balance auditions and showing off your vocal chops in the riff-off, ALL while being torn between two new love interests?If you haven’t yet, start reading PRETTY LITTLE LIARS!- CREATE YOUR PERSONAL LOOK & choose your best outfits- EXPERIENCE THE SUSPENSE & uncover the mysterious “A”- FIND LOVE & decide your path to romanceOTHER FEATURED STORIES:MEAN GIRLS: SENIOR YEAR. Step inside girl world & navigate the drama and romance of Senior Year at North Shore High with Regina George, Cady, Janis, Damian, & the Plastics. You’ll also meet your dream guy but Regina won't let you get him easily.DEMI LOVATO: PATH TO FAME. After winning a spot on Demi’s tour, it’s time to embrace your true self and define your dream career. Demi shares her advice on taking control of destiny, what choices will YOU make?FALLING FOR THE DOLAN TWINS. On your first day in LA, you meet the cutest guy you've ever seen—then you meet his twin brother. As you get closer to Ethan & Grayson Dolan, the sparks start to fly...but who will you choose?PRETTY LITTLE LIARS and all related characters and elements © & ™ Warner Bros. Entertainment Inc. Wouldn’t it be amazing if YOU were a character in your favorite story? Episode lets you do just that with over 75,000 gripping stories, where you make choices that matter. From your favorite movie titles like Mean Girls to fan faves such as Bad Boy’s Girl, Episode will keep you interacting for hours.

With all your favorite genres, there’s no time like the present to fall in love, rise to fame, or solve a decade-old mystery. Better yet, join this incredible community and become a creator of your own - writing stories, amassing lots of fans along the way.

Join our #episodesquad for #episodelife.

FOLLOW US:
instagram.com/episode
facebook.com/TheEpisodeApp

THE BELLAS ARE BACK and they’re getting into deep treble. Sing in the spotlight and live out your dream of becoming a BELLA in PITCH PERFECT IN DEEP TREBLE™!

You’ve always dreamed of joining the hottest acapella group in ACA-HISTORY, the Bellas! Now you’re at Barden University and it’s your time to shine. Will you be able to balance auditions and showing off your vocal chops in the riff-off, ALL while being torn between two new love interests?

If you haven’t yet, start reading PRETTY LITTLE LIARS!

- CREATE YOUR PERSONAL LOOK & choose your best outfits
- EXPERIENCE THE SUSPENSE & uncover the mysterious “A”
- FIND LOVE & decide your path to romance

OTHER FEATURED STORIES:

MEAN GIRLS: SENIOR YEAR. Step inside girl world & navigate the drama and romance of Senior Year at North Shore High with Regina George, Cady, Janis, Damian, & the Plastics. You’ll also meet your dream guy but Regina won't let you get him easily.

DEMI LOVATO: PATH TO FAME. After winning a spot on Demi’s tour, it’s time to embrace your true self and define your dream career. Demi shares her advice on taking control of destiny, what choices will YOU make?

FALLING FOR THE DOLAN TWINS. On your first day in LA, you meet the cutest guy you've ever seen—then you meet his twin brother. As you get closer to Ethan & Grayson Dolan, the sparks start to fly...but who will you choose?

descriptionHTML:
Talking Cat Run - Talking Kitty Kitten is an exciting, FREE endless talking running game for boys and girls of all ages. Talking Cat Run - Talking Kitty Kitten is specifically designed for children and families who want to enjoy and play with the coolest and cutest kittens in the world!

😻Talking Cat Run - Talking Kitty Kitten Features 🙀
- Dash, slide and jump to dodge obstacles and animals - don't talk!
- Chase the rainbow and catch coins with the coin boost
- Choose from 12 unique Kitty Cats, each with different accessories
- Equip the rainbow shield to smash through obstacles!
- Use a variety of exciting power ups to reach the high score
- Unlock new upgrades, cats and boosts in the shop with your coins
- Come back every day to complete tasks and earn exclusive rewards
- Great graphics and performance
- Free updates: New features and characters implemented regularly

Choose your favourite Kitty kitten and guide them through the forest and city as you try to collect as many coins as possible.

Run, jump, dash and slide to dodge obstacles and keep your Tom kitty safe in this endless cat racing simulator game, where fast reactions will be required if you want to reach the highscore! Run, surf and slide for as long as you can to earn more points, and collect powerups to double your score! Will you be able to reach the high score in Tom Talking Cat Run - Talking Kitty Kitten?

In Talking Cat Run - Talking Kitty Kitten once you and your cute kitty have collected enough coins, you will be able to chase the rainbow for a HUGE number of coins as the coin boost starts. Watch coins fall from the sky as you try to collect them all!

After you have finished running in Talking Cat Run - Talking Kitty Kitten, you can visit the store where 12 kitties are waiting for you to unlock them. Try and collect exciting cats such as Tom, Salem the witches cat, Jess the post cat and even Princess, the most royal cat in the land!

As well as Cats, you can upgrade your powerups, buy extra boosts or even purchase headstarts so that you can whizz straight to the front of the pack on your next run! Reaching the highscore is more possible than reaching the end of a ball of wool with all of these upgrades in Talking Cat Run - Talking Kitty Kitten!

Subway trains, temple ruins and city streets can all be dangerous for a cute little kitty, so don’t forget to double tap the screen and activate the rainbow shield if you are going to crash! Smash through obstacles and collect extra coins for as long as it is active!

Make sure to come back every day to complete daily tasks. These will allow you to earn exclusive and exciting rewards!

Talking Cat Run - Talking Kitty Kitten Racing has been carefully designed for boys, girls and families to have ultimate fun!

Please rate us for future improvements and updates!

Player Customizer: in FreeKick World Soccer Cup 2018 - you can create your own character.

Make sure of it by yourself. Game process is nice and the device works fine

Today you can install and play FreeKick World Soccer Cup 2018 absolutely free. The game also has purchases, but they are optional.

Install our soccer, win and become the World Champion!

description: Learn what it’s like to be a real-life veterinarian! Use 3D professional vet tools and become the best animal doctor around! Your adorable, cuddly animal patients aren’t feeling well, and they need YOU to treat them! Examine your furry patients real doctor equipment and help them until the feel all better!Gain amazing vet skills by learning what it takes to be a real veterinarian! Become the favorite doctor of all the animals in town! The furry kitty, fluffy puppy and soft bunny all need your help! From a bad case of the flu, to nasty scrapes, these fuzzy cuties are all waiting for you to cure them! Challenging puzzles & fun matching games inside!Features:> Get ready to be the best veterinarian EVER! Treat the injured animals!> Examine your furry friends with 3D professional vet tools!> Dress the animals up in cute outfits & play with them at the park!> Do challenging puzzles and matching games to find out what’s wrong with the animals!> Kitty caught the flu! descriptionHTML:
Learn what it’s like to be a real-life veterinarian! Use 3D professional vet tools and become the best animal doctor around! Your adorable, cuddly animal patients aren’t feeling well, and they need YOU to treat them! Examine your furry patients real doctor equipment and help them until the feel all better!


Gain amazing vet skills by learning what it takes to be a real veterinarian! Become the favorite doctor of all the animals in town! The furry kitty, fluffy puppy and soft bunny all need your help! From a bad case of the flu, to nasty scrapes, these fuzzy cuties are all waiting for you to cure them! Challenging puzzles & fun matching games inside!


Features:

I know the commercials make it free, but it is beyond ridiculous when i spend 6x more time watching the commercials than playing the game.  I might as well just turn on the TV.

descriptionHTML:
Experiment to feed Om Nom candy! Cut the rope like never before. Everything you love and new gameplay! 200 levels and more to come!

Eager to learn more about Om Nom's adventures? Watch "Om Nom Stories" cartoons and other amazing videos on our YouTube channel!
www.zep.tl/youtube

The little green monster Om Nom is back and hungrier than ever! Team up with the Professor, a mad (but not bad!) scientist determined to study Om Nom’s candy-loving behavior through a series of experiments. Use suction cups and other funny devices to collect shiny gold stars, uncover hidden prizes and unlock new levels!

Key features:

- 8 level packs with 200 levels
- Innovative physics gameplay
- Adorable character
- Outstanding graphics
- Om Nom animation shorts
- Superpowers
- Constant free updates with new levels and animations

About the game:

“Cut the Rope: Experiments from ZeptoLab follows the exact same formula as its predecessor, which means it's awesome.” - IGN

“If Cut the Rope: Experiments uncovers one scientific truth, it’s this: ZeptoLab knows how to put together a charming puzzle game.” - Tapscape

“Cut the Rope: Experiments takes the original's addictive formula and adds a splash of deviousness, thanks to the addition of some cunning new items.” - Pocket Gamer

---------
Now you can earn free superpowers by trying new apps from Getjar. All these permissions allows us to give you Superpowers and Star Key for free.

"Get Tasks" permission. This allows us to give you free Superpowers. If you install an app for a free Superpower, this permission tells us when you have opened it. No other data is captured or stored.
"Get Accounts" permission. This creates a user account for you so you can restore upgrades and purchases.
"Access Network State" permission. This allows us to determine if WiFi is available and use that instead of the Carrier Network.
"Internet" permission. This allows us to communicate on the internet.
"Read Phone State" permission. This is required by some advertisers. No private data is captured or stored.

Help us improve our games. We love your feedback. Contact us at support@zeptolab.com.

description: Transforming Robot Shark Game – Robot transformation is an exciting new addition robot shark games for the fans of shark robot games who also like to play transforming robot games. Robo shark comes with lethal features of real robot games with shark attack and transforming robots capability which are unseen in robot animal games. Oceans and even cities have not remained safe and robot transform wars with animal robot have called for the rise of a flying robot warrior from best of robot games in this shark robot action game. Combining the action involved in robot shark games with the skills required in transforming robot games, the robot simulator game takes the robot whale action to extreme levels for real robot games fans. The open missions for robo shark will prove to be more dangerous than other animal robot games including robot crocodile, spider, horse, robot snake and robot tiger. description: Tap your way to an earthy empire in “Dirt Inc.” and become the global power house in the world market! ----------------------------------------Game Features•	Simple one tap controls to dig as many minerals as you can! •	Spend your income on upgrades to increase your production from the hundreds to the thousands, millions and beyond! •	Buy a Digger to automatically dig for you!•	Hire a foreman to help find the rarest of earthly minerals like coal, copper, gold and even diamonds! (Yes coal is a rare earthly material...).•	Build mines in the quarry to automatically generate even more income!•	Purchase awesome bonuses in the research lab such as generating income while not even playing the game!•	Progress through five different worlds, each with their own visuals, via the progression bar system!•	Reset the game with the prestige system and play again with an income bonus based on your last play through!•	Complete contract missions to earn rewards.•	Can you unlock all of the achievements?----------------------------------------Adverts and Permissions•	Permission for network access to show ads, no other special permissions!•	Unobtrusive banner ads at the bottom of the screen!•	Full screen ads (completely optional) to set your own company name, get in game skins, support us (with a reward) and to increase your mission rewards!----------------------------------------With an almost never ending upgrade system you will be entertained for weeks!----------------------------------------Games played on some mobile devices can be intensive causing them to generate heat.- If your device is heating up too much, play for small periods of time and allow it to cool in between.- Do not play games while the charger is plugged in.- Do not leave your device on playing games for excessive periods of time.- Do not leave games playing overnight.----------------------------------------ADDITIONAL DISCLOSURES- For specific information about how Digital Panda Studios collects and uses data, please read our privacy policy available through the Privacy Policy field below.- Requires acceptance of our End User License Agreement ("EULA") and Privacy Policy. You can find both of these documents on our website, please review them before downloading.- Minimum system requirements: Android v4.0 or above, 70mb of free space and 512mb of RAM.- You must be aged 13+ to play.
descriptionHTML:
Tap your way to an earthy empire in “Dirt Inc.” and become the global power house in the world market!

----------------------------------------

Game Features

• Simple one tap controls to dig as many minerals as you can!

• Spend your income on upgrades to increase your production from the hundreds to the thousands, millions and beyond!

• Buy a Digger to automatically dig for you!

• Hire a foreman to help find the rarest of earthly minerals like coal, copper, gold and even diamonds! (Yes coal is a rare earthly material...).

• Build mines in the quarry to automatically generate even more income!

• Purchase awesome bonuses in the research lab such as generating income while not even playing the game!

• Progress through five different worlds, each with their own visuals, via the progression bar system!

• Reset the game with the prestige system and play again with an income bonus based on your last play through!

• Complete contract missions to earn rewards.

• Can you unlock all of the achievements?

----------------------------------------

Adverts and Permissions

• Permission for network access to show ads, no other special permissions!

• Unobtrusive banner ads at the bottom of the screen!

• Full screen ads (completely optional) to set your own company name, get in game skins, support us (with a reward) and to increase your mission rewards!

----------------------------------------

With an almost never ending upgrade system you will be entertained for weeks!

----------------------------------------

Games played on some mobile devices can be intensive causing them to generate heat.

- If your device is heating up too much, play for small periods of time and allow it to cool in between.
- Do not play games while the charger is plugged in.
- Do not leave your device on playing games for excessive periods of time.
- Do not leave games playing overnight.

----------------------------------------
ADDITIONAL DISCLOSURES

- For specific information about how Digital Panda Studios collects and uses data, please read our privacy policy available through the Privacy Policy field below.

- Requires acceptance of our End User License Agreement ("EULA") and Privacy Policy. You can find both of these documents on our website, please review them before downloading.

- Minimum system requirements: Android v4.0 or above, 70mb of free space and 512mb of RAM.

- You must be aged 13+ to play.

title: Dirt Inc.

description: Lift Safety For Kids is a good game to teach your little ones about lifts. In this safety game, you can learn how to use the lift properly will ensure fun for everyone. Here we can add tons safety levels for you, In the first level, you can learn If the elevator is full Be patient and wait for the next ride, Wait till everyone gets off the elevator. At the next level, you can learn about lift buttons and many more learning tips. Next level kids will learn what to do when the lift is stuck and also learn how to exit from the elevator. After that, you can learn what to do in case of fire in the elevator. So visit each and every level in this kids learning game and learn tons safety tips in a fun way. Play and enjoy this Kids Safety game and don't forget to share it with your friends and all the family members.List of safety tips:- Unshoulder your bag before entering into the elevator- Stand straight facing the elevator's door- Press the button of the desired level- Keep the elevator neat and clean- Stand peacefully and wait till your desired level- Stand still till the door is completely open- Prefer stairs in case of fireLift Safety For Kids is pre toddler and early age educational game. descriptionHTML:
Lift Safety For Kids is a good game to teach your little ones about lifts. In this safety game, you can learn how to use the lift properly will ensure fun for everyone. Here we can add tons safety levels for you, In the first level, you can learn If the elevator is full Be patient and wait for the next ride, Wait till everyone gets off the elevator. At the next level, you can learn about lift buttons and many more learning tips. Next level kids will learn what to do when the lift is stuck and also learn how to exit from the elevator. After that, you can learn what to do in case of fire in the elevator. So visit each and every level in this kids learning game and learn tons safety tips in a fun way. Play and enjoy this Kids Safety game and don't forget to share it with your friends and all the family members.

List of safety tips:

- Unshoulder your bag before entering into the elevator
- Stand straight facing the elevator's door
- Press the button of the desired level
- Keep the elevator neat and clean
- Stand peacefully and wait till your desired level
- Stand still till the door is completely open
- Prefer stairs in case of fire

Lift Safety For Kids is pre toddler and early age educational game. The safety game is designed specifically for kids.

description: The goal of this slide puzzle is simple: move blocks horizontally to create and clear full lines. It's free to play and easy to learn. Slidey Block Puzzle will keep you hooked from the first moment and you'll start enjoying the gameplay taste you've been missing.It will be a kind of nostalgia for who played classic arcade games like snake games, connect the dots games and blocks games on classic cell phones. Slidey's gameplay is simple just like those classic arcade and puzzle games, yet offers a fresh unique mechanic with gorgeous and cute graphic design.Enter the blocks world and get higher and higher scores with mind tricks. When the blocks are winking and waiting for you to unlock, the huge mouth of the gigantic monster is ready to swallow the block stack . Free your mind, relax and act wisely by dragging the blocks and making full brick rows. Slidey Block Puzzle is one of the trending games among the users who are searching a simple but original slide puzzle game.Why you'll love Slidey:● A new type of brain training puzzle, entertain your brain for minutes or for long hours● Endless challenge, you can play forever yet you'll still find something undiscovered● Earn Experience as you play. Rank up your cute shaman and get access to exciting shaman masks and gifts● An engaging original soundtrack with custom made sound effectsBOOSTERS help you when you're stuck in this mind game:CHARGER: Charges a block and clears its neighbor blocksCOLLECTOR: Collects and removes the blocks of the dominant color on boardSMASHER: Smashes and breaks large blocks into smaller piecesUse these boosters when you have a block stack and blocks get close to the monster mouth. You can't leave the phone when playing this block puzzle game just as playing classic snake games or connect dots, pipes or bricks games. Slidey is the most colorful and sparkling game among the free mind games. Everyone from all ages can solve challenging and brain-teasing block puzzles.Slidey: Block Puzzle is a highly polished addictive puzzle game where the fun is in trying to find short-term strategies and mind tricks to make the right move to blast blocks. We always love to hear from you. Please send us your feedback, we are truly listening: https://narhelp.zendesk.com/hc/en-us/requests/newThanks for playing :)
descriptionHTML:
The goal of this slide puzzle is simple: move blocks horizontally to create and clear full lines. It's free to play and easy to learn. Slidey Block Puzzle will keep you hooked from the first moment and you'll start enjoying the gameplay taste you've been missing.

It will be a kind of nostalgia for who played classic arcade games like snake games, connect the dots games and blocks games on classic cell phones. Slidey's gameplay is simple just like those classic arcade and puzzle games, yet offers a fresh unique mechanic with gorgeous and cute graphic design.

Enter the blocks world and get higher and higher scores with mind tricks. When the blocks are winking and waiting for you to unlock, the huge mouth of the gigantic monster is ready to swallow the block stack . Free your mind, relax and act wisely by dragging the blocks and making full brick rows. Slidey Block Puzzle is one of the trending games among the users who are searching a simple but original slide puzzle game.

Why you'll love Slidey:
● A new type of brain training puzzle, entertain your brain for minutes or for long hours
● Endless challenge, you can play forever yet you'll still find something undiscovered
● Earn Experience as you play. Rank up your cute shaman and get access to exciting shaman masks and gifts
● An engaging original soundtrack with custom made sound effects

BOOSTERS help you when you're stuck in this mind game:
CHARGER: Charges a block and clears its neighbor blocks
COLLECTOR: Collects and removes the blocks of the dominant color on board
SMASHER: Smashes and breaks large blocks into smaller pieces

Use these boosters when you have a block stack and blocks get close to the monster mouth. You can't leave the phone when playing this block puzzle game just as playing classic snake games or connect dots, pipes or bricks games. Slidey is the most colorful and sparkling game among the free mind games. Everyone from all ages can solve challenging and brain-teasing block puzzles.

Slidey: Block Puzzle is a highly polished addictive puzzle game where the fun is in trying to find short-term strategies and mind tricks to make the right move to blast blocks. We always love to hear from you. Please send us your feedback, we are truly listening: https://narhelp.zendesk.com/hc/en-us/requests/new

Thanks for playing :)

description: Quick and action packed dice based battles for players looking for something more than the guesswork of Battleship but not quite the complexity of Chess.* Play turn based battles in realtime in online multiplayer mode with opponents from around the world, or play solo vs the AI.* Singleplayer AI features three different play styles: Aggressive, Defensive & Balanced.* Three basic unit types: Infantry, Tanks and Rocket Artillery.* Earn reputation and gold for every enemy you destroy and for every match you win.* Level up to unlock and deploy more options like landmine, transport helicopter, fighter aircraft and battleship.* Plant landmines to surprise enemy infantry.* Use helicopters to airdrop your forces behind enemy lines.* Call in air strikes to destroy enemies on the ground.* Deploy a battleship to launch cruise missiles deep into enemy territory.
descriptionHTML:
Quick and action packed dice based battles for players looking for something more than the guesswork of Battleship but not quite the complexity of Chess.

* Play turn based battles in realtime in online multiplayer mode with opponents from around the world, or play solo vs the AI.

* Singleplayer AI features three different play styles: Aggressive, Defensive & Balanced.

* Three basic unit types: Infantry, Tanks and Rocket Artillery.

* Earn reputation and gold for every enemy you destroy and for every match you win.

* Level up to unlock and deploy more options like landmine, transport helicopter, fighter aircraft and battleship.

* Plant landmines to surprise enemy infantry.

* Use helicopters to airdrop your forces behind enemy lines.

* Call in air strikes to destroy enemies on the ground.

* Deploy a battleship to launch cruise missiles deep into enemy territory.

ABOUT TutoTOONS Games for Kids
Crafted and play-tested with kids and toddlers, TutoTOONS games cherish the childhood and help children learn the basic life skills through the games they love. Dress up games can develop creativity and art skills, cleanup games build good every day habits, cooking games show how to help parents at home, pet games teach to share and care. These are just a few examples how TutoTOONS games let children explore the world around them and develop on their screen time.

description: Sackboy, the knitted hero from the multi-award winning LittleBigPlanet™ series on PlayStation® lands into the palm of your hand in this brand new endless platformer! RUN as fast as you can through an ever-changing handcrafted world DASH to ESCAPE the GOO and the clutches of the grumpy Negativitron! *Iconic worlds and characters from the LittleBigPlanet™ games *Exclusive costumes to customise your Sackboy *Collect Stickers to unlock Prizes! *Power Ups and Upgrades including the all-new Glider! *Challenge and compete with your friendsRun SackBoy! Run! is free to download and can be played without making In App Purchases, however some in-game items such as Save Me Hearts can be acquired through in-app purchases. You can turn off the payment feature by disabling in-app purchases on your device.Bubbles can be purchased or can be collected in game at no extra cost. They can also be used to buy special costumes that increase your multiplier, upgrades to power ups, Save Me Hearts or Lucky Chests.Run SackBoy! Run! is free to download and uses push notifications, this feature can be turned off by disabling it on your device.A third party Analytics provider (Google Analytics) may collect data about how you use this app. This can be disabled within the settings menu within Run Sackboy! Run!.A valid Facebook account is required to activate Leaderboards.A third party solution (Ad Colony) is used within the game for promotional purposes.
descriptionHTML:
Sackboy, the knitted hero from the multi-award winning LittleBigPlanet™ series on PlayStation® lands into the palm of your hand in this brand new endless platformer!

RUN as fast as you can through an ever-changing handcrafted world
DASH to ESCAPE the GOO and the clutches of the grumpy Negativitron!

*Iconic worlds and characters from the LittleBigPlanet™ games
*Exclusive costumes to customise your Sackboy
*Collect Stickers to unlock Prizes!
*Power Ups and Upgrades including the all-new Glider!
*Challenge and compete with your friends

Run SackBoy! Run! is free to download and can be played without making In App Purchases, however some in-game items such as Save Me Hearts can be acquired through in-app purchases. You can turn off the payment feature by disabling in-app purchases on your device.

Bubbles can be purchased or can be collected in game at no extra cost. They can also be used to buy special costumes that increase your multiplier, upgrades to power ups, Save Me Hearts or Lucky Chests.

Run SackBoy! Run! is free to download and uses push notifications, this feature can be turned off by disabling it on your device.

A third party Analytics provider (Google Analytics) may collect data about how you use this app. This can be disabled within the settings menu within Run Sackboy! Run!.

A valid Facebook account is required to activate Leaderboards.

A third party solution (Ad Colony) is used within the game for promotional purposes.
developerAddress:
PlayStation Mobile Inc.
2207 Bridgepointe Parkway
San Mateo, CA 94404
United States

- As you run for your life, you will notice The Gardens now look even more beautiful!
- Loads of bug fixes and tweaks, including a streamlined tutorial to help you escape that dastardly Negativitron!
summary: Help Sackboy escape the Negativitron in this new adventure from LittleBigPlanet™
title: Run Sackboy! Run!

description: Beware police duty driver! It is a Warning situation & tough job to carry Labradors or German Shepherds from training centers to city municipal police. After all.. They are needed in police detective teams .. So, Take trained dogs in cargo transporter truck to reach police stations on time. Yes Police Dog Transport Truck is a tough driving job with red alerts for the driver who has to complete cargo delivery safely without any car stunts. City subway crime also needs police dogs’ assistance & also for border patrol for security cops. So do not make these proficient & skilled animals be late for cop dog duty with police warden in this 3D simulator. Hey Cop transporter truck driver! Be initiator of protection of your beloved city subway, amusement parks & restaurants on Christmas & New Year’s holidays! Police officers need help to arrest criminals & chase convicts escaping from the hands of border police. They also need to suspect strolling prisoners in city streets, Hence be a master cop driver & transport expensive dogs with full protection in this police duty simulator. Remember! Take these police assets safely to cop stations .. By making sure you do not hit a trailer truck or cargo lorry in this highway driving mania. Also protect your mini van, which has expensive animals as cargo delivery to be taken as shipment in best condition. These animals .. After all have to protect citizens from terrorist attacks especially shopping malls & city halls , where services are being conducted. Complete Police Duty ! Dog training is complete & there isn’t any time to waste finances. So, complete transportation in police van with special cage Winter holidays are her on the edge .. and full security protocol needs patriotic role from each and everyone in country .. So complete transportation of sniffer dogs of best breeds like Rottweiler, Labrador retriever & Doberman to scare swags & criminals ready for attack.  Why Police Dog Transport Truck driving is important ? These doggies are the breeds who can protect innocent passengers from criminal attacks & terrorists who have not been considered by army. Military planes & army tanks cannot be taken to busy city, but instead you need to solve cases in urban areas with the help of police dogs like ultimate canine…So download this city savior & animal heroic role play … Police Dog Transport Truck Sim to ignite the sense of life achievement in this instinct chasing simulator.

description: Now that Henry has escaped from prison it's time for him to get back out there and make (read: steal) some money. A local museum has recently unveiled it's latest exhibit, the Tunisian Diamond. Help Henry decide which ways to get into the museum and steal the diamond!-Features 40 unique fails!-Three different endings, you could keep it low key, or charge in!-Fail menus make it easy to go back to the previous choice and see all the possible scenarios!-Achievements will give you that extra little thing to hunt for!This game is  the sequel to Escaping the Prison. Get it here: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=air.com.puffballsunited.escapingtheprison&hl=en
descriptionHTML:
Now that Henry has escaped from prison it's time for him to get back out there and make (read: steal) some money. A local museum has recently unveiled it's latest exhibit, the Tunisian Diamond. Help Henry decide which ways to get into the museum and steal the diamond!

-Features 40 unique fails!

-Three different endings, you could keep it low key, or charge in!

-Fail menus make it easy to go back to the previous choice and see all the possible scenarios!

-Achievements will give you that extra little thing to hunt for!

This game is the sequel to Escaping the Prison. Get it here: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=air.com.puffballsunited.escapingtheprison&hl=en

description: This is not just a simple dog rac, it is latest and amazing professional dog race simulation with beautiful riding tracks environment. So welcome to the challenging and exciting game which is quite different from other racing games. This extreme wild dog rush competition is going to be held in between multiple dogs. Wild crazy dog race is a real competitive animal racing game. Amazing greyhound racing championship includes multiple rally missions on different tracks which give you a real thrilling experience of animal race. You have to show professional skills to handle the dog’s race. This unique animation game has addictive challenges and exciting missions.Now you are going to enter into the world of dog riding and this game is especially designed to express the riding skills of racing fans. The beautiful realistic environment and breathtaking animal racing scenes will attract you to play this addictive and adventurous game. So you have to run your dog as fast as you can to eliminate the other dogs. You have to win the rush in any case in required time periods otherwise you can loose the mission if opponent eliminates you first. On the other hand after completing the mission you can get score which can help you to unlock new fast and multi races speedy dogs. Feel the thrill & excitement and enjoy the real bulldog race along with multiple levels. So you have to win the race first to unlock next levels. You have to know that which rider chases the destination first will lead to win. This racing game is a combination of multiple and different races dogs. The racing tracks are especially designed for dog rush. Amazing realistic background sound effects, stunning 3D graphics, smooth control and multiple camera angles will help you to control the game with different angles. You can enjoy with this modern racing practice. This dog race both kids and adults can play easily. Features:Attractive and adventurous game playAmazing multiple races dogsMultiple exciting levels Realistic background sound effectsSmooth and easy controlThrilling and multiple challenges Amazing stunning 3d graphicsRealistic running tracks

description: If you’re into makeover games, this one will knock your socks off. And if you’re not into makeover games, this one will change that! You’re the hottest new fashion stylist girl in Hollywood, and your awesome reputation is already bringing you fame and fortune! Dress up famous fashion models and VIP celebrities. Bring out their star style and give them beautiful makeovers! Create tons of incredible looks for your clients - find them the perfect outfits for their big events - they’ll love their new hot tops, skirts, shoes and accessories!Welcome to Hollywood - the land of VIPs, where fashion rules and all the celebrities and famous models need to look amazing to keep up their star status! That’s where you come in - you're the stylist to the stars! Everyone’s talking about the hot looks you created at the latest red carpet event (that skirt Angie J. wore - AMAZING!), and now all the girls are piling in to your stylist office for fashion makeovers! descriptionHTML:
If you’re into makeover games, this one will knock your socks off. And if you’re not into makeover games, this one will change that!

You’re the hottest new fashion stylist girl in Hollywood, and your awesome reputation is already bringing you fame and fortune! Dress up famous fashion models and VIP celebrities. Bring out their star style and give them beautiful makeovers! Create tons of incredible looks for your clients - find them the perfect outfits for their big events - they’ll love their new hot tops, skirts, shoes and accessories!

Welcome to Hollywood - the land of VIPs, where fashion rules and all the celebrities and famous models need to look amazing to keep up their star status! That’s where you come in - you're the stylist to the stars! Everyone’s talking about the hot looks you created at the latest red carpet event (that skirt Angie J. wore - AMAZING!), and now all the girls are piling in to your stylist office for fashion makeovers! Dress up these girls and make them over, in this most fabulous of all makeover games!

> You’re the next big thing - stylist girl to the stars! Open up your very own Hollywood stylist office and become famous! Makeover games are the perfect way to perfect your star style.
> Style and dress up your VIP clients (supermodels, famous movie stars and more!) in glamorous outfits - once you choose the perfect top and skirt, add gorgeous accessories to finish off the look!
> From magazine cover shoots to red carpet movie premieres, it’s your job to give your clients makeovers that will help them wow the crowds!

> Reach #1 in the Top Stylist charts, gain followers and likes!
> Help your models win lots of fashion catwalk and photoshoot contests! The judges will adore the skirts and shoes you dressed them in!
> Play fun fashion girl and stylist minigames!
> Collect coins as you style and dress up. Makeover games are so much fun!

comments: Some serious potential here!!! The concept is pretty cool and its easy to master,hard to put down.My 9yr old loves it,I think he's gone through an entire nootbook drawing levels. It's pretty simple as far as graphics and overall game play right now but the building blocks are in place to turn this into something really amazing if the devs wanted to. I hope they do! Good job devs!

This is a great game, and i love it. I also have a few ideas for improvements. First, new colors. Purple could be coins or collectibles for new mode maybe called "collect" to add to escape and destroy blue objects. Next is orange, which is like red, but only affects the player, not blue objects, blue objects will land on it like it would on black. Next is yellow, which is like red, but only affects blue objects, not players, the player can still walk on it like black. I hope zero-one reads this and trys to implement some of these new ideas into a future update, keep it up!!!

Very good, suggesting a new difficulty in Catalog mode called Insane which is harder than hard and a new button next to the save button when playing a world. It teleports you to your checkpoint. And these people who accept worlds as published are cruel. At least give us tips on how to publish games!

This game is great. Making courses is easy, and playing them is fun. This is similar to Super Mario Maker, but better in its own ways.  PROBLEMS:  There are only 2 game modes. They aren't bad, but adding another one would be great. Sometimes the controls are annoying, but thankfully they aren't too bad.  You have to pay coins for a lot of features. You even have to pay for uploading a course. 😵 There is no dislike button for courses. Very trivial, but still missing.  The amount of things you have to pay coins for versus the rate you earn coins is kind of messed up. You may have to play tons and tons of courses just to unlock a character.

I DON'T RECOMMEND THIS TO YOU!  I do not have those markers. And you think.. Its fun! THINK ABOUT THIS: When you create your game,  THE BLACK ( Floor ) DOES NOT shown! Yes, I could play this game still IF there is no bugs! Ugh! Creator.. I GIVE THIS  A BAD.    This is. Really. Bad. So this isn't a skit! It may be good on your device.. But not mine! Thank you for whoever reads this.

I created a game and then I published it and it told me to pay 7 coins (fake money) then when I cancelled the publish and then published it again it told me to pay 43 coins. This is outrageous that I have to pay more coins for the same game. Apart from that I want another update because it only has two game modes(Destroy blue elements and escape) and it would make this app so much better.
description: Everybody has one day dreamed of creating his own video game. It's now possible with Draw Your Game! All you need is paper, pens, and our app! It's super easy!Why not get the app now and read these simple instructions during the download?1. Draw your own game's world on a piece of paper, using black, blue, green and red pens.2. Use the Draw Your Game app to take a picture of your drawing.3. Wait a few seconds, while Draw Your Game transforms the drawing into an amazing game !4. Play your brand new game, with a cute character that you can control. 5. Share your creation with other Draw Your Game players from all around the world. Of course we check them to be sure there's no inappropriate content!How do I play?In Draw Your Game, there are three modes you can play!▶ Create: this is where you build your own world with paper and pens! You can also draw inside the game, so you can create on the go.▶ Explore: play the levels of drawers from all around the world. Some of them are easy. Some others are complex and very hard. You choose whatever you want to play!▶ Adventure: play through a hundred levels picked by our team of dreamers. Follow unlockable characters through their journey into a world of paper.There are two kinds of levels:▶ Escape: the character must find a way off the paper to escape and finish the level. Sometimes it requires some clever mind tricks!▶ Destruction: the character must push blue objects into red ones to destroy them. It's not as easy as you may think!The game is FREE (with ads)▶ For free, you can finished the game and unlock all features if you play in the adventure mode.▶ You earn a sticker each time you finish a level and you unlock a feature when you finish a season.▶ You need to wait 2 hours between each season unlocked.▶ There is a video ad every 5 minutes.If you don't want to wait or don't want to play in adventure mode, you can do a purchase to unlock features:▶ One by one if you want to consume your stickers.▶ You can buy the "Full Version" (in-app purchase) to unlock all at once.▶ A special offer is available for the "Full Version" the first 24h (30%).So what are these pens for?You can pick between four colors to draw a world:▶ Black for stationary floors/ground (basically, platforms)▶ Blue for movable objects that the character can push around (we love physics)▶ Green for bouncing elements (sounds like fun)▶ Red for elements that will destroy the character or the blue objects (don't touch them!)Here are some advices from our artists▶ Use fairly wide felt-tip pens.▶ Choose vivid colors.▶ Take pictures under good lighting.Important noticeOur team approves each new world before releasing it to the community, and a rating system is used to rank the top worlds against one another. We spend an epic amount of time to ensure that your children (and ours as well) won't see inappropriate content in the game. Of course, if you think we've missed some things, there are ways inside the game to report us anything you want.Some limitations we're aware ofDraw Your Game only runs on smartphones and tablets with a camera that can be used to scan your drawings.Want to share you creations with us?We're always amazed by your creations. We validate every level, but if you want to get some love and feedback about your world, share it with us on Twitter (@DrawYourGame) or Facebook! You can also send us your feature suggestions!
descriptionHTML:
Everybody has one day dreamed of creating his own video game. It's now possible with Draw Your Game! All you need is paper, pens, and our app! It's super easy!


Why not get the app now and read these simple instructions during the download?
1. Draw your own game's world on a piece of paper, using black, blue, green and red pens.
2. Use the Draw Your Game app to take a picture of your drawing.
3. Wait a few seconds, while Draw Your Game transforms the drawing into an amazing game !
4. Play your brand new game, with a cute character that you can control.
5. Share your creation with other Draw Your Game players from all around the world. Of course we check them to be sure there's no inappropriate content!

How do I play?
In Draw Your Game, there are three modes you can play!

▶ Create: this is where you build your own world with paper and pens! You can also draw inside the game, so you can create on the go.
▶ Explore: play the levels of drawers from all around the world. Some of them are easy. Some others are complex and very hard. You choose whatever you want to play!
▶ Adventure: play through a hundred levels picked by our team of dreamers. Follow unlockable characters through their journey into a world of paper.

There are two kinds of levels:
▶ Escape: the character must find a way off the paper to escape and finish the level. Sometimes it requires some clever mind tricks!
▶ Destruction: the character must push blue objects into red ones to destroy them. It's not as easy as you may think!

The game is FREE (with ads)

▶ For free, you can finished the game and unlock all features if you play in the adventure mode.
▶ You earn a sticker each time you finish a level and you unlock a feature when you finish a season.
▶ You need to wait 2 hours between each season unlocked.
▶ There is a video ad every 5 minutes.

If you don't want to wait or don't want to play in adventure mode, you can do a purchase to unlock features:
▶ One by one if you want to consume your stickers.
▶ You can buy the "Full Version" (in-app purchase) to unlock all at once.
▶ A special offer is available for the "Full Version" the first 24h (30%).

So what are these pens for?

You can pick between four colors to draw a world:
▶ Black for stationary floors/ground (basically, platforms)
▶ Blue for movable objects that the character can push around (we love physics)
▶ Green for bouncing elements (sounds like fun)
▶ Red for elements that will destroy the character or the blue objects (don't touch them!)

Here are some advices from our artists

▶ Use fairly wide felt-tip pens.
▶ Choose vivid colors.
▶ Take pictures under good lighting.

Important notice
Our team approves each new world before releasing it to the community, and a rating system is used to rank the top worlds against one another. We spend an epic amount of time to ensure that your children (and ours as well) won't see inappropriate content in the game.
Of course, if you think we've missed some things, there are ways inside the game to report us anything you want.

Some limitations we're aware of
Draw Your Game only runs on smartphones and tablets with a camera that can be used to scan your drawings.

Want to share you creations with us?
We're always amazed by your creations. We validate every level, but if you want to get some love and feedback about your world, share it with us on Twitter (@DrawYourGame) or Facebook! You can also send us your feature suggestions!

descriptionHTML:
HD version of Rolling on the Geometry Sky with new levels, traps and obstacles. The new special effects and sounds will make you feel inside the game.

Rolling Geometry Sky HD is a game that tests the limits of your speed and reaction. The splendid scene of a 3D geometry world allows you to experience the imaginary traps and obstacles. Now, control the ball and conquer all the worlds of this exciting challenge.

How to play?

Drag the ball to the left or right to avoid all obstacles and
try not to fall off the track! Collect many power-ups to transform the ball
into an invulnerable ball of fire!


Features:

• One touch control with simple operations
• Stunning 3D worlds and effects
• Nice music and 3d sound effects
• Rich scenes (including Geometry, Forest, Snowfield, Candy and more!)
• Realistic light effects (day - night)
summary: Rolling Geometry Sky is a game that tests the limits of your speed and reaction.
title: Rolling Geometry Sky
